character.description: Escavalier, known as the Cavalry Pokémon, resembles a bug with various knight and jousting gear. Bravely facing their opponents, they fly around at high speed, striking with their pointed spears. By wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet, the steel armor protects their whole body. It evolves from Karrablast when traded for a Shelmet.

character.name: Morobareru
character.description: Amoonguss, the Mushroom Pokémon, has Pokéball designs on its cap and hands. Its pre-evolution and the Voltorb family do too, although the Voltorb family doesn`t include the button in their designs.

character.name: Shibirudon
character.description: Eelektross, known as the Electric Fish Pokémon, is the evolution of Eelektrik. It evolves from Eelektrik when it contacts a Thunderstone. Eelektross is an eel-like Pokémon that resembles a lamprey, with a long tentacle-like, finned limb extending from its head. It has red eyes, dark blue body, and, unlike its earlier evolutions, possesses clawed, paddle-like arms with yellow spots and yellow-and-red palms. It has a beige fin on the upper portion of its body and beige fin-like legs below. It is also the final evolution of Tynamo. Eelektross and its evolutionary relatives are the only Pokémon to have no weaknesses other than Ghost/Dark. However, this is due to their Levitate ability, which eliminates what would be their sole weakness to the Ground type.

character.name: Hitomoshi
character.description: Litwick, known as the Candle Pokémon. It is based on a candle. It is known for fooling people and guiding them with its light when it is in fact actually stealing life energy from the victim, which it then uses as fuel to burn for the flame on its head. IGN`s Sam Claiborn scoffed at the idea of a candle Pokémon, along with the design of the 5th generation altogether.

character.name: Kumasyun
character.description: Cubchoo, known as the Chill Pokémon, is based on a polar bear cub. Cubchoo is constantly plagued by a cold and a runny nose. It will sniff up its mucus during attacks and then use it to fight with. When it becomes sicker and the mucus becomes too runny, its ice attacks become weaker. Cubchoo were given out for a promotional event in the games Pokémon Black and Pokémon White in Japan from October 22, 2010 to November 29, 2010.

character.name: Agilder
character.description: Accelgor, known as the Deshelled or Shell Out Pokémon, is the evolution of Shelmet. It is based on a ninja, combined with a giant tube worm. In order to evolve Shelmet into Accelgor, one must be traded for a Karrablast. Shelmet`s shell is transferred to Karrablast, allowing Shelmet to evolve into Accelgor and Karrablast into Escavalier.

character.name: Sazandora
character.description: Hydreigon, known as the Brutal Pokémon, is the evolution of Zweilous, and final stage of Deino. Hydreigon is a three-headed bipedal dragon with six wings. It is extremely vicious and destructive as it travels the skies, attacking anything that moves. Its duplicate heads do not have brains, but are used to eat and attack. Hydreigon appears in the Nintendo 3DS download Pokédex 3D, where it was featured as one of the first collectible Pokémon. A Hydreigon under the ownership of Carlita appeared in Pokémon the Movie: Black - Victini and Reshiram and White - Victini and Zekrom. It appears to have shiny coloration in the White version of the film, while being normal colored in the Black version. Official Nintendo Magazine`s Chris Schilling used Hydreigon as an example of a unique Pokémon in this generation compared to the safer ones earlier in the game.

character.name: Matori
character.description: Matori is Giovanni`s secretary and a member of Team Rocket. She became his main reference for current operations when the Team Rocket began to infiltrate the Unova region. She kept Jessie, James, Meowth informed of their mission and was the one that suggested they be the Team Rocket members for his special mission there to find out information about Dream Energy and the Meteonite. After the events in the Unova desert, Matori gave Jessie, James, Meowth the runaround when they tried to contact Giovanni and Matori explained that Giovanni was in the middle of an important meeting and couldn`t leave it to talk to them. Matori forwarded Giovanni`s message to them stating, "From now, you`re free to do what you want. Do your best for the sake of the Rocket Gang."

character.name: Muggyo (Dent)
character.description: Cilan`s Stunfisk lived together with Ash`s Palpitoad in a lake near Raimon City. They were very protective of trespassers in their lake and Stunfisk used Discharge on Ash and Ash`s Oshawott to get them out of the lake. Cilan decided to get out his fishing rod to keep it occupied while Ash and Ash`s Oshawott battled the Palpitoad. Cilan ended up swinging the Stunfisk on the ground to knock it out and then caught it. Don George Tournament - Raimon Town Luke`s Larvesta battled against Cilan`s Stunfisk in the second round of the Don Battles Tournament in Raimon Town. Luke`s Larvesta used String Shot as an attack and a defense in the battle which showed Cilan that Luke knew how to battle with his Larvesta. When Cilan`s Stunfisk was wrapped up with String Shot, Cilan allowed it to get hit by Flamethrower to set it loose. Luke`s Larvesta ended up defeating Cilan`s Stunfisk with a powerful Flamethrower though which eliminated Cilan from the tournament. Battle against Skyla Skyla`s Swoobat was matched up against Cilan`s Stunfisk in Skyla`s air battle and she believed that her Swoobat would be victorious. In the actual gym battle, Cilan`s Crustle was replaced by Cilan`s Stunfisk to determine the winner of the match after it was defeated by Skyla`s Swanna. Cilan`s Stunfisk started off with a Thundershock but Skyla`s Swanna shook it off fairly easily and Skyla chastened Cilan by saying that it would take at least a Thunderbolt to affect her Swanna. Skyla`s Swanna countered with a Hurricane whic tossed Cilan`s Stunfisk into the air but wasn`t too effective against it as its actually quite mobile in the air. Cilan`s Stunfisk then used Scald which also burned Skyla`s Swanna. It appeared that Skyla`s Swanna was nearing defeat but it used Aqua Ring to heal itself and then attacked with a powerful Brave Bird and knocked out Cilan`s Stunfisk to give Skyla the victory in the match.

character.name: Pansy
character.description: Alexa is a journalist who works at a publishing house in Lumiose City. She is Viola`s elder sister who is the Santalune City Gym Leader.

character.name: Erikiteru (Pansy)
character.description: Alexa`s Helioptile was the first 6th generation Pokémon to appear in the anime series.

character.name: Erikiteru
character.description: Helioptile, the Generator Pokémon, is a solar powered and lizard-like Electric Pokémon with a new attack called Parabolic Charge that heals itself.

character.name: Onvern (Pansy)
character.description: Alexa`s Noivern was revealed when it was sent out to protect her from a bunch of Ghost Pokémon.

character.name: Harimaron
character.description: Chespin (ハリマロン), known as the Spiny Nut Pokémon, is a Grass-type and one of the three Pokémon available to players at the start of the game. Described as having a curious nature, it resembles a rodent that has a chestnut-like shell on its head which protects it in battle.

character.name: Fokko
character.description: Fennekin (フォッコ) is the Fox Pokémon, and is the Fire-type starter Pokémon. It is described as being temperamental and it enjoys eating twigs.

character.name: Haribogue
character.description: Quilladin (ハリボーグ) is the evolved form of Chespin. Its strong shell repels attacks, but it is often too kindhearted to attack on its own.

character.name: Brigarron
character.description: Chesnaught (ブリガロン), known as the Spiny Armor Pokémon, is the final evolved form of Chespin. With its new Fighting type, it defends its friends and allies by putting its own life in danger. Its armoring allows it to endure powerful explosions. It can learn Spiky Shield to defend itself and possibly cause the opponent`s attack to backfire.

character.name: Horubee
character.description: Bunnelby (ホルビー), the rabbit-like Digging Pokémon, is stated to have ears strong enough to break through tree roots. It also possesses the new Cheek Pouch ability and it is noted to use the attack Dig.

character.name: Gekogashira
character.description: Frogadier (ゲコガシラ) is the evolved form of Froakie. Frogadier`s jumping skill has improved, and it often jumps onto the ceiling or into trees to confuse its opponent.

character.name: Keromatsu
character.description: Froakie (ケロマツ), the Bubble Frog Pokémon, is the Water-type starter Pokémon. The ruff around its neck is actually made of bubbles which it uses to protect itself from attacks. In the anime, Ash Ketchum meets Froakie during his first day in the Kalos Region who becomes one of his first Pokémon in the region.

character.name: Yayakoma
character.description: Fletchling (ヤヤコマ), the Tiny Robin Pokémon, is said to be friendly and is popular among many trainers. It knows the attack Flame Charge, hinting at its future evolutionary form.

character.name: Trimmien
character.description: Furfrou (トリミアン) is a poodle Pokémon, and its Fur Coat (ファーコート) Ability both protects it and can be modified by the trainer by taking it to a groomer.

character.name: Kofukimushi
character.description: Scatterbug (コフキムシ), the Scatterdust Pokémon, is a caterpillar Pokémon that hides in the forest from flying Pokémon. The fur around its neck has a dust that it uses to adjust its temperature, allowing Scatterbug to live in any environment.

character.name: Mafoxy
character.description: Delphox (マフォクシー), known as the Fox Pokémon, is the final evolved form of Fennekin. It can now control its powerful flames with its new Psychic abilities, such as through its new Mystical Fire attack.

character.name: Vivillon
character.description: Vivillon (ビビヨン), the Scale Pokémon, is a butterfly-like Pokémon that has a colorful pattern on its wings that it flaps to release its scales. Depending on the part of the world the player lives in, he or she will encounter Vivillon with a particular pattern in their game, with players living in other parts of the world receiving entirely different patterns.

character.name: Kofurai
character.description: Spewpa (コフーライ), the Scatterdust Pokémon, is a pupal form of Scatterbug that is the middle stage on its evolution into Vivillon. It has grown more hair around its body which is hard enough to repel attacks and can be straightened into sharp spikes to deter attackers.

character.name: Meehcru
character.description: Skiddo (メェークル), the Mount Pokémon, later evolves into Gogoat. It said that it has lived alongside humans for so long that it does not mind carrying people. Like Gogoat, the player character will be able to ride one at some point in the game.

character.name: Goronda
character.description: Pangoro (ゴロンダ), the Daunting Pokémon, is the evolved form of the panda Pokémon Pancham, gaining a new Dark-type during the evolution. Pangoro seems violent, but it actually believes in fairness in battle, with its leaf able to predict its opponents moves.

character.name: Shishiko
character.description: Litleo (シシコ), the Lion Cub Pokémon, is hot blooded and always ready to battle. When it fights a strong opponent, Litleo`s red mane burns brightly.

character.name: Kaenjishi
character.description: Pyroar (カエンジシ) is the evolved form of Litleo, the male version possessing a large fiery mane. Pyroar possesses the new moves Noble Roar and Echoed Voice, owing to its lion nature.

character.name: Flabebe
character.description: Flabébé (フラベベ), the Single Bloom Pokémon, is one of the new Fairy-type Pokémon. When it is born, it finds a flower that it lives on for the rest of its life and gains power from in battle. This flower is different depending on where any particular Flabébé is found.

character.name: Floette
character.description: Floette (フラエッテ) is the evolution of Flabébé. It keeps the same color flower as it had when it evolves. Its Flower Veil ability helps friendly Grass-type Pokémon.

character.name: Horuudo
character.description: Diggersby (ホルード) is the Digging Pokémon and it uses its large ears as shovels to dig through the ground. Its ears are so strong that it can lift heavy stones, and it is often used in construction work.

character.name: Nyasper
character.description: Espurr (ニャスパー) is the "Restraint" Pokémon, so named because it keeps its psychic powers under control by holding its ears shut. Espurr prefer to be independent, and moves and acts at its own pace. It evolves into Meowstic.

character.name: Nyaonix
character.description: Meowstic (ニャオニクス) is a cat Pokémon that has different male and female forms that not only differ in appearance but also differ in moves and Abilities.

character.name: Shushup
character.description: Spritzee (シュシュプ), the Perfumed Pokémon, is a Fairy-type Pokémon that can only be caught in the Y version. In the past it was kept by women for its perfume which it uses to entrance its opponents. This fragrance changes depending on what Spritzee has eaten.

character.name: Hitotsuki
character.description: Honedge (ヒトツキ), the Sword Pokémon, is a ghost that has possessed an ancient sword. It uses the blue tassel on its hilt as a hand and holds its own sheath in battle. It should be noted that Steel type Pokémon are no longer resistant to damage from Dark-type attacks, making this Pokémon and its evolutions vulnerable to Dark-type attacks such as Bite and Dark Pulse as well as Fire-type and Ground-type strikes (Fighting type moves have no effect as it is a Ghost-type).

character.name: Peroppuff
character.description: Swirlix (ペロッパフ), the Cotton Candy Pokémon, is a Fairy-type Pokémon that can only be found in the X version. It loves candy and sweets so much that its fur resembles cotton candy in appearance and texture, using its stickiness to its advantage in battles.

character.name: Elezard
character.description: Heliolisk (エレザード) is the evolved form of Helioptile. A single Heliolisk can generate enough electricity to power a high-rise building as it takes in solar energy with the large frill around its neck.

character.name: Chigoras
character.description: Tyrunt (チゴラス) is a fossil Pokémon resembling a Tyrannosaur. It uses its powerful jaws in battle, and its Ability Strong Jaw increases its bite move powers.

character.name: Bloster
character.description: Clawitzer (ブロスター), the Howitzer Pokémon, is the evolved form of Clauncher. Its massive claw can produce a high enough water pressure to break through armored hulls, and it uses the claw to propel itself through the water.

character.name: Melecie
character.description: Carbink (メレシー), the Jewel Pokémon, lives deep in caves, and has existed unseen by human eyes for millions of years. It is very timid, and prefers to live alone.

character.name: Zygarde
character.description: Zygarde (ジガルデ) is also known as the Order Pokémon and its body somewhat resembles the letter Z. It is a mythical Pokémon said to appear only when disorder strikes the Kalos region`s environment. Its ability Aura Break reverses the effects of Xerneas and Yveltal`s abilities.

character.name: Bokurey
character.description: Phantump (ボクレー) is also known as the Stump Pokémon: it is Trevenant`s pre evolved form. It is born when a spirit possesses a rotten tree stump. It can use the new move Forest`s Curse to add the Grass Type to an opposing Pokémon.

character.name: Serena
character.description: Serena is a young girl who is just starting on her journey as a Pokémon trainer in the Kalos region. She appears to have met http://anidb.net/ch6693 [Satoshi] before.

character.name: Eureka
character.description: Eureka is Citron`s younger sister. She met Ash in Niare City and she and her brother were his very first battle opponents in the Kalos region, a battle he won`t forget soon. Eureka is a girl of strong character, who`s always searching for a future wife for her brother. Since she`s not a Pokémon Trainer yet, but she gets Citron to "keep" Pokémon for her. She was confirmed to be in the XY anime in Smash #153. Eureka`s Japanese name origin is from the lily family which is "Yuri-ka" in Japanese

character.name: Citron
character.description: Citron is Eureka`s older brother. He met Ash in Niare City and he and his sister were his very first battle opponents in the Kalos region, a battle he won`t forget soon. He`s a great inventor, a gym leader and carries his pride and joy, the "Eipam Arm" in his backpack. Eureka is always searching for a future wife for her brother. Since she`s not a Pokémon Trainer, she gets Citron to "keep" Pokémon for her. Citron was confirmed to be in the XY anime in Smash #153. His Japanese name is based off of the fragrant citrus fruit with the same name.

character.name: Viola
character.description: Viola is an active woman with a nice body and a great waist. She is the Gym Leader of Santalune City Gym (Hakudan City). Battling trainers isn`t her only talent as she is also a professional Pokémon photographer.

character.name: Serena no Okaasan
character.description: Grace is Serena`s mom. She is a Sihorn racer who lives is in the Kalos region. Her name in the Japanese games is Saki (サキ) but has not been confirmed in the anime.

character.name: Sihorn (Serena no Okaasan)
character.description: Grace`s Rhyhorn lives with Grace at her house in the Kalos region. They participated together in Sihorn races. Serena has been practicing with Grace`s Rhyhorn to learn how to ride and race.

character.name: Yayakoma (Serena no Okaasan)
character.description: Grace`s Fletchling lives with Grace at her house in the Kalos region. It`s often used as an alarm clock to wake up Serena. It is also often seen watching Grace and Serena do chores and practice Sihorn races.

character.name: Platane-hakase
character.description: Professor Sycamore is a a Pokémon Professor who has a laboratory in Lumiose City of the Kalos region. He gives out Froakie, Chespin or Fennekin to beginning trainers. His name Platane in Japanese originates from the Platanus genus.

character.name: Keromatsu (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Froakie contacted Professor Sycamore laboratory to let them know he wanted to give up Froakie. The staff at the lab had been worried about Froakie. This particular Froakie is a bit different to the other ones the professor had given out. It refused to listen to its trainers during battle, it ran away from a trainer simply because it didn`t like its trainer and several trainers have returned it to Professor Sycamore lab. Froakie though took a liking to Ash and it came to the rescue when Team Rocket was trying to steal Pikachu. It also accompanied Ash up the Prism Tower when they went after Garchomp. Finally, as Ash was leaving the lab, Froakie appeared with its Poké Ball, indicating that it wanted to travel with him. Ash agreed and he caught Froakie.

character.name: Dedenne (Citron)
character.description: Clemont`s Dedenne appeared in a forest outside of Lumiose City. As soon as Bonnie saw it she thought it was cute and wanted to keep it but because she wasn`t a Pokémon Trainer, she tried to convince her brother to capture it for her. Bonnie noted that it wasn`t afraid of humans and it got along with Pikachu quickly since they`re both Electric types and they communicated with electricity. Clemont initial attempt to capture it was not successful though. A few days later though, the same Dedenne reappeared as it had been following them the whole time they had been traveling. This time though Clemont was successful in capturing it. It really seems to like the Pokémon food that Clemont and Bonnie give it.

character.name: Horubee (Citron)
character.description: Clemont`s Bunnelby battled against Pikachu in its very first battle as Clemont as its trainer. He told it to just relax and it would do great. Their battle was cut short as Team Rocket interfered.

character.name: Limone
character.description: Limone is the father of Clemont and Bonnie. He lives in Lumiose City where he runs an electric appliance store in this city together with Denryu. He seems to know a lot about electric devices and Electric Pokémon. He`s told Clemont many times that being strict to challengers as a Gym Leader is fine but strictness alone won`t make them become good Trainers. He`s told his son that as the Gym Leader of the Lumiose City Gym, he is the pride of their city. Initially, little was known about this masked person that dresses up like Burshamo, but he does try to help the citizens of Lumiose City. Blaziken Mask tries to keep his identity unknown to the general population and often goes out at night like a super hero to help our around the city.

character.name: Bursyamo (Bursyamo Kamen)
character.description: Blaziken Mask`s Blaziken was first seen by Ash at the Lumiose City airport when it jumped over him. It later came to his and Pikachu`s rescue after he jumped off the Prism Tower. It has also been seen in its mega evolved form.

character.name: Gablias (Platane-hakase)
character.description: Professor Sycamore`s Garchomp resides at Professor Sycamore`s lab in Lumiose City. Team Rocket infiltrated the lab and used a device on it to control it so they could figure out how to make it Mega Evolve. Unfortunately it went wrong and Professor Sycamore`s Garchomp went into a rage throughout the city. Ash went after it and followed it up the Prism Tower. With the help of Ash`s Froakie, Ash and Pikachu were able to break the collar that Team Rocket put on Professor Sycamore`s Garchomp. Despite being fatigued, Professor Sycamore`s Garchomp fully recovered from the incident.

character.name: Junsaa
character.description: Officer Jenny is the local law enforcement leader in the Kalos region. Each city and area has a Jenny who looks exactly the same as she does elsewhere in the Kalos region though they do look different compared to their Jenny counterparts elsewhere in the Pokémon World. The most noticeable different between Kalos region Jenny and those from elsewhere in the Pokémon World is their haircut.

character.name: Joy
character.description: Nurse Joy in the Kalos region looks a little different than she does in the other regions in the Pokémon World. Her duties are to take care of injured Pokémon as they arrive at the Pokémon Center. She is a trained nurse and with the help of her Wigglytuff she is able to nurse the Pokémon back to health. Like the other regions in the Pokémon World, the Nurse Joy of the Kalos region have many sisters. The only real way to differentiate between them when next to each other is to look at the color of the badge on their outfits.

character.name: Pukurin (Joy)
character.description: Nurse Joy`s Wigglytuff helps Joy around the Pokémon Center caring for injured Pokémon. It also does odd jobs that need to be done around the Center such as getting badge cases for trainers.

character.name: Sophie
character.description: Sophie is one of Professor Sycamore assistants who works at his lab. She confronted Team Rocket when they tried to pose as scientific service people. She was also seen presenting the Starter Pokémon to Serena.

character.name: Cosette
character.description: Cosette is one of Professor Sycamore assistants who works at his lab. She confronted Team Rocket when they tried to pose as scientific service people.

character.name: Maaiika (Kojirou)
character.description: James` Inkay was first spotted in Miare City when it ate James` croissant. It seemed to like the food that he was eating and it followed them on their journey. When they stopped to eat lunch, it appeared again and this time it ate his sandwich. In a quick battle with Wobbuffet, Inkay squirted ink all over its face. James then lured it with more sandwiches and then caught it with a monster ball. James` Inkay often uses an ink squirting attack during battles but its not an actual move.

character.name: Yayakoma (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Fletchling was spotted in the Route 4 forest when it stole the Pokémon food that Bonnie was trying to feed to Clemont`s Dedenne. Ash noted that the Fletchling was fast and that he wanted to catch it after seeing it move so quickly. Initially, Ash`s Froakie wanted to battle but Ash told it not to be reckless and to let Pikachu handle the battle. Ash`s Froakie wanted to punish Yayakoma because Bonnie was looking so sad after trying to feed Dedenne. After working on a strategy, they picked a rocky area where Ash`s Froakie could combine the differences in elevation with Ash`s Froakie jumping power to achieve even higher levels of mobility to counter Fletchling flying speed. After an intense battle, Ash captured Fletchling and the two of them agreed to be friends from that day on. Bonnie forgave Ash`s Fletchling for stealing the food but gave it an Oran Berry as a sign of reconciliation.

character.name: Fokko (Serena)
character.description: Serena`s Fennekin was the Pokémon that Serena chose as her starter Pokémon at Professor Sycamore lab. Serena thought that after seeing all the starter Pokémon for real that they were all cute but she had already decided before she left home that she would get a Fennekin.

character.name: Vivillon (Viola)
character.description: Viola`s Vivillon is her pride as a Gym Leader and the Pokémon she often counts on during gym battles. It was the second Pokémon that Viola sent out to battle against Ash in both their battles. In the first round, Ash`s Fletchling was defeated by Viola`s Vivillon after it got caught in the Sticky Web from earlier in the battle and couldn`t break free when Vivillon`s SolarBeam hit it. Realizing that he needed to train his Pokémon some more, Ash`s Fletchling was able to learn from the training in the rematch battle and ride the wind better but it was still defeated by Viola`s Vivillon. Pikachu though still had damage left from its fight against Ametama but it overcame that and was able to wake up from Sleep Powder by using Electro Ball on itself. With ice on its wing, Viola`s Vivillon started moving strangely giving Pikachu the opportunity to knock it out with Thunderbolt to win the rematch gym battle.

character.name: Livolt (Junsaa)
character.description: Officer Jenny`s Manectric is often seen accompanying Officer Jenny throughout the Kalos region.

character.name: Citroid
character.description: The Citroid is an artificial life form created by Clemont. Clemont was so busy as a Gym Leader that he barely had any time for my beloved inventions. That`s when he got the idea of making a capable Gym Leader Robot that could help him with his Gym matches. It is currently the interim Gym Leader of the Lumiose Gym. The name Citroid is a combination of Citron and Android. Clemont initially incorporated his image of an ideal Gym Leader into the AI but it later proved to be too strict as it required challengers to have at least 4 gym badges. Clemont did a few tweaks to change its software to give it a more modest attitude, that the number of badges a Trainer has is irrelevant, added kindness to its strictness, to never forget to give advice to the challenger after the battle and finally compassion. It has a Master Recognition Battle mode which requires an voice activation code in order to initiate the mode. During the initial setup, the Citroid was damaged and instead of Clemont having the code set as "Croquette" it set the password as "Please bear with me from today on. I`m Citron, the Gym Leader!". This caused Clemont a lot of problems as he couldn`t initiate the Master Recognition Battle mode properly. He finally figured out what happened as was able to initiate the code to do the battle to prove that he was Clemont.

character.name: Coil (Citron)
character.description: Clemont`s Magnemite attacked Clemont and his friends when they entered the gym because at the time the Citroid was the owner of the gym and it had orders to get rid of intruders. Clemont`s Magnemite did recognize Clemont though and smiled but still attacked. It does know an electric attack but which move it is was not confirmed in the episode dialog.

character.name: Rarecoil (Citron)
character.description: Clemont`s Magneton attacked Clemont and his friends when they entered the gym because at the time the Citroid was the owner of the gym and it had orders to get rid of intruders. It does know an electric attack and a sonic like attack but which moves they are were not confirmed in the episode dialog.

character.name: Elezard (Citron)
character.description: Clemont`s Heliolisk resides at the Lumiose Gym where it battles Trainers under the direction of the Citroid. It seemed very happy to see Clemont when he returned to the gym. During the Master Recognition Battle mode, Clemont told Heliolisk to come at him with all its might. It learned new battle techniques and moves from the direction of the Citroid but Clemont was able to defeat his Heliolisk to prove to the Citroid that he was the master.

character.name: Harimaron (Citron)
character.description: Clemont`s Chespin was initially one of the three Pokémon a Trainer receives from Professor Sycamore when they start out on their journey. It took the basket of macarons that Serena had baked the night before and began stuffing itself and didn`t want to share them. Sophie noted that Harimaron loves pranks. Team Rocket captured Professor Sycamore, Serena and Bonnie but Harimaron was able to follow a macaron crumb trail to their hideout. It was initially more concerned about getting the macarons back but it finally realized that Team Rocket was also a threat, so it helped out and manged to stop the Mega Mega Nyarth mecha. During its time with Clemont in the crisis situation, the two began to bond and just as Clemont was leaving Professor Sycamore lab, it indicated that it wanted to travel with Clemont. Professor Sycamore gave Clemont Harimaron`s monster ball and he got it.

character.name: Sanpei
character.description: Sanpei is a ninja boy that knows the Ninja art of leaf concealment. He lives in the Ninja Village and likes to train alongside his Pokémon. He speaks in a pseudo-archaic manner. He has two brothers that live in the village: his eldest brother and strongest combatant of the ninja village, with his Gekkouga and the number two of the ninja village, his brother Nihei and Fushigibana. Sanpei was watching Ash`s Froakie train in a forest near Shoyo City when he revealed himself camouflaged in front of a tree. His training showed Ash how helpful it could be when he defeated Ash`s Froakie in a battle. Clemont commented that he`d never seen a Quick Attack like the one Sanpei`s Frogadier was able to do. Sanpei is quite proud of the attack as no one gets up after the attack which is very fast and powerful. Despite being rivals on the battlefield, Sanpei was friendly enough to help Ash`s Froakie learn Quick Attack at the request of Ash although the training ended up that it learned Double Team. After an encounter with Team Rocket, Sanpei gained new found respect for Ash and the two of them vowed to have another battle if they met again.

character.name: Ippei
character.description: Ippei is Sanpei`s eldest brother and strongest combatant of the ninja village. He has a Gekkouga.

character.name: Gekkouga (Ippei)
character.description: Ippei`s Greninja is Ippei`s main Pokémon and strongest combatant of the ninja village.

character.name: Nihei
character.description: Nihei is Sanpei`s brother, the number two of the ninja village. He has a Fushigibana.

character.name: Fushigibana (Nihei)
character.description: Nihei`s Venusaur is Nihei`s main Pokémon that lives in the ninja village.

character.name: Zakuro
character.description: Grant is the Gym Leader of the Cyllage Gym located in Cyllage City in the Kalos Region. It is a Rock type gym. He is friends with Viola and the two have battled previously at the Battle Chateau. He held the peerage rank of Duke until he defeated Viola to achieve the rank of Grand Duke. He is an avid climber and loves to climb everything in sight including walls. He particularly likes climbing the wall in the salon at the Battle Chateau and is often seen there. Before leaving the Battle Chateau, he watched Ash Ketchum`s battle against Tesla and he noticed the momentum that Ash Ketchum had in the battle. Viola told Grant that Ash Ketchum has guts and that his passion would get him fired up. Ash Ketchum wanted to raise his rank to battle Grant but he revealed to Ash Ketchum after his battle victory against Viola that he was the Gym Leader of the Cyllage Gym. Grant told him that he was looking forward to the day he`d come to challenge him.

character.name: Elle
character.description: Aria in a Idol who is regularly featured in the "Best 10 PokéVisions (ポケビジョン・ベスト10)" and she started off in idol Pokémon unit with her Fokko and they are now immensely popular. Bonnie thought that Serena was in no way inferior to Aria. While on their way to Shoyo City, Ash and his friends stopped at a Pokémon Center and watched PokéVision. The episode they watched featured Aria`s "Idol Life" (アイドルライフ) which was that week`s number one video. Shauna told Serena while making Poffles at the Pokémon Summer Camp that Aria was now a Pokémon Performer and had become a major player there. Trainers participating in Tripokalons are called Pokémon Performers. Aria still regularly uploads PokéVisions though despite participating in the tournaments. At the time of the Pokémon Summer Camp, Aria held the title of "Kalos Queen" as she had won each tournament three or more times and had entered the Master Class. Ellena While shopping in disguise in a town near Miare City, Ellena met Serena and the two of them spent the day together. Aria almost gave away her true name but caught herself. She dressed up in glasses and a hat. During their time shopping, she gave Serena some advice and told her that Pokémon Performers always need to have the biggest smiles and that Serena needs to smile always. Ellena suggested that they have a double battle and by fighting together with her partner Pokémon, Serena might make a discovery. She explained to Serena that in double battles, the cooperation between Trainer and Pokémon, as well as between the Pokémon themselves, is very important. The battle ended prematurely as Ellena received a phone call and had to leave. Serena later saw Aria on TV and realized that Ellena was Aria. Aria and Serena were matched up in the Kalos Queen final round. Aria`s Vivillon was revealed at the beginning of the performance and it lifted Aria up in the air to make it look like she was flying. The performance was enough for Aria and her Pokémon to defend their title and retain the title of Kalos Queen by defeating Serena.

character.name: Ayaka
character.description: Ayaka is an experienced Pokémon Trainer who was first seen traveling through the Kalos region. She battled Alan in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle in the forest but after a fierce battle she ended up loosing the fight.

character.name: Alan
character.description: Alan is a Trainer who travels around to "master Mega Evolution and stand on the top as the strongest". Although he studied Mega Evolution with Professor Sycamore once and was the professor`s assistant, the two parted way. While traveling through a forest in Kalos region, he encountered Ayaka in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle and after a fierce battle he ended up winning the fight. Watching the battle was Manon who quickly became attached to Alan as she had some questions for him to answer and soon after became his `traveling companion`. Nurse Joy told Alan that Siebold of the Kalos Region Elite Four had a restaurant nearby, so Alan went to challenge him. When Siebold approached Alan, Alan told him that he wanted to try Zumi`s unofficial menu. The two battled in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle and despite the type disadvantage, Alan held his own for most of the battle until he finally lost. Siebold was impressed with Alan as he was powerful enough to corner him even with a type disadvantage. He complemented him on an excellent battle as it had been a while since he "last had fresh meat with a backbone".

character.name: Zumi
character.description: Siebold is a member of the Kalos region`s Elite Four. In addition to being part of the Elite Four, he is also a chef. His main partner Kamex can Mega Evolve into Mega Kamex. Nurse Joy told Alan that Siebold of the Kalos Region Elite Four had a restaurant nearby, so Alan went to challenge him. When Siebold approached Alan, Alan told him that he wanted to try Zumi`s unofficial menu. The two battled in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle and despite the type disadvantage, Alan held his own for most of the battle until he finally lost. Siebold was impressed with Alan as he was powerful enough to corner him even with a type disadvantage. He complemented him on an excellent battle as it had been a while since he "last had fresh meat with a backbone".

character.name: Louis
character.description: Louis`s appearance is intense and so are his battling skills. He had a fierce battle with Alan over a Mega Stone that he just obtained. Louis`s partner Gablias can Mega Evolve into a Mega Gablias. He refers to himself as "the great Dragon Trainer Louis". Despite being a Dragon trainer, he didn`t realize that Lizardon`s type changes to Dragon when in its Mega Evolved form. That error proved to be his downfall as he lost the Mega Evolved battle against Alan.

character.name: Manon
character.description: Manon is a new Trainer just starting her journey in the Kalos region. She refers to her partner Harimaron as "Hari-san", who she just got recently from Professor Sycamore and she always asks it for help. While traveling in the forest she watched the Mega Evolution battle between Ayaka and Alan (Kalos) and was shocked when she saw his black Lizardon. She was fascinated with it and wanted to learn more despite Alan not being very forthcoming with his answers. She was very impressed and amazed with the story that Professor Sycamore told about Ash Ketchum and how Professor Sycamore`s Garchomp at the laboratory went on a rampage. Having watched Alan battle Mega Evolved Pokémon, Manon decided that she wanted to search for Mega Stones with Alan (Kalos) and he carelessly agreed to let her travel with him.

character.name: Fleur-de-lis
character.description: Lysandre is a mysterious scientist seemingly observing Alan.

character.name: Lizardon (Alan)
character.description: Alan`s Charizard is the evolved form of Alan`s Charmander and is Alan`s main traveling companion. It can also Mega Evolve into Mega Charizard X during battles. Ayaka`s Absol battled against Alan`s Charizard in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle in a forest in Kalos but after a fierce battle Ayaka`s Absol ended up loosing the fight and Alan`s Charizard won. When Siebold approached Alan, Alan told him that he wanted to try Zumi`s unofficial menu. The two battled in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle and despite the type disadvantage, Alan`s Charizard held it own for most of the battle against until it finally lost. Siebold was impressed with Alan`s Charizard as it was powerful enough to corner him even with a type disadvantage. He complemented it on an excellent battle as it had been a while since he "last had fresh meat with a backbone". Siebold also commented that Alan`s Charizard speed and power are exquisite and that it had an excellent texture.

character.name: Absol (Ayaka)
character.description: Ayaka`s Absol appears to be Ayaka`s main Pokémon. It can Mega Evolve into Mega Absol. Ayaka`s Absol battled against Alan`s Charizard in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle in a forest in Kalos but after a fierce battle Ayaka`s Absol ended up loosing the fight and Alan`s Charizard won.

character.name: Gablias (Louis)
character.description: Gabunoji is the name that Louis gave his Gablias in the Japanese version. Louis` Garchomp can Mega Evolve into Mega Gablias in battle. Louis believes that Louis` Garchomp is quite impressive. Louis` Garchomp had a fierce battle with Alan`s Charizard over a Mega Stone that Alan had just obtained. Despite being a Dragon trainer, Louis didn`t realize that Lizardon`s type changes to Dragon when in its Mega Evolved form. That error proved to be his downfall as he lost the Mega Evolved battle against Alan.

character.name: Harimaron (Manon)
character.description: Hari-san is the name that Manon gave her Harimaron in the Japanese original. It was the first Pokémon she received from Professor Sycamore as a beginning Trainer in the Kalos region. Hari-san likes to emulate some of the facial expressions that Manon and its always having to rescue her from danger.

character.name: Kamex (Zumi)
character.description: Siebold`s Blastoise is his main partner. It can also Mega Evolve into Mega Blastoise during battles. Mega Kamex`s Ability is Mega Launcher. When Siebold approached Alan, Alan told him that he wanted to try Zumi`s unofficial menu. The two battled in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle and despite the type disadvantage, Alan`s Charizard held it own for most of the battle against until it finally lost. Siebold was impressed with Alan`s Charizard as it was powerful enough to corner him even with a type disadvantage.

character.name: Chigoras (Zakuro)
character.description: Grant`s Tyrunt was the second Pokémon that Ash Ketchum faced in his Gym Battle against Grant. Ash Ketchum noted after consulting his dex that he and his Pokémon would have to be careful of that huge mouth and those fangs that Grant`s Tyrunt has. Bonnie also commented that Grant`s Tyrunt looked like a formidable opponent right from the start. Ash`s Froakie was the first to face Grant`s Tyrunt having defeated Grant`s Onix. Ash Ketchum underestimated Tyrunt and Draco Meteor ended up knocking out Ash`s Froakie. Ash`s Fletchling was the next Pokémon sent out to fact it but it was also quickly overpowered and knocked out of the air with Dragon Tail. The final matchup was Grant`s Tyrunt vs Pikachu and Grant thought Ash Ketchum was bold for using an Electric type against Tyrunt as it is both a Rock and a Dragon type and had an overwhelming advantage. Pikachu used a move Ash Ketchum called Draco Meteor Tomb where it was able to deflect the attack with Iron Tail. After using Rock Tomb, Pikachu was able to deflect one of the rocks into Tyrunt`s mouth and finish it off with Thunderbolt.

character.name: Millefeui
character.description: Miette is a Pofflés Chef that participated in a Pofflés Contest in a town near Shoyo City which she specifically came to and competed against Serena. She could see that Serena liked Ash Ketchum and she wondered if he had a future bride. Ash Ketchum confused by the question stated he didn`t which left the door open for Miette to distract Serena in the contest. After they couldn`t find any berries for the second round to use as ingredients for their Pofflés, Miette and Serena decided to work together to find some until they managed to find some and defeated Rocket Gang who had been taking them. After loosing the Pofflés Contest, she said she would continue her journey and keep studying Pofflé making. She also told Serena that if she continued to keep her head in the clouds, she`d steal Ash Ketchum away. The two shook hands and parted ways. She also participated in the Tripokalon in Fujo Town where Serena was also a competitor. Beforehand she told her that she`d settle her score with her and might make a move on Ash Ketchum, too. She won the Pofflé round and advanced to the performance round but ended up loosing to Serena who managed to get the most votes. Despite loosing that day, Miette vowed to win next time and that she hadn`t given up on her competition of gaining Ash Ketchum`s affection either.

character.name: Peroream (Millefeui)
character.description: Millefeui`s Slurpuff was first seen when it ate the Pofflé that Serena had made. It thought her Pofflé was so-so. Peroream can pick up sweet scents, so it`s good at finding Berries. It was instrumental in helping Millefeui find some berries for the final round of the Pofflés Contest. Since Peroream is the evolved form of Peroppuff, it could understand the feelings of the Peroppuff very well that were angry after Rocket Gang had disrupted their food source.

character.name: Carne
character.description: Diantha is the strongest Pokémon Trainer in the Kalos region and is also the Champion of the Elite Four. As a famous actress, she is know for her elegant, full of mature composure and according to Serena, she is just the perfect woman in every aspect. Her character is based off of the real world actress Audrey Hepburn. Her movie "My Sweet Lady" (マイスイーツ・レディ) was the current blockbuster when Ash Ketchum was in the Kalos region. The movie title is a nod to the Audrey Hepburn movie My Fair Lady. Serena considers Diantha to be her idol. Professor Sycamore has been trying to get Diantha`s Key Stone so he can study it but she has respectfully declined his requests on numerous occasions. While doing location shooting in a region, Diantha makes sure she tries the sweets that are famous there, no matter how busy she is. When Serena got the last gâteau au chocolat slice, she decided to share it with Diantha who was in disguise. She usually declines private matches with Trainers, but since Ash Ketchum and his friends shared the cake with her, she made an exception and battled against him. The match was left undecided as it was interrupted by Rocket Gang. Ash Ketchum vowed to battle her again when he won the Kalos League.

character.name: Sirknight (Carne)
character.description: Diantha`s Gardevoir is Diantha main partner. The two share a close bond and are able to communicate during battles without speaking. It can Mega Evolve into Mega Gardevoir during battle. While at the Guipna Highlands for a shooting a movie, a thick fog arrived and Diantha got lost in it. Diantha`s Gardevoir apparently came out of the monster ball she left with her manager and came looking for her, leading the way for everyone. During its exhibition match against Morgan`s Absol, it was quickly able to dodge all the moves and defeat it quite easily.

character.name: Minami
character.description: Minami is Diantha`s assistant. She organizes interviews and meetings and tries to keep her on schedule. She`s almost overprotective of Diantha and her attitude is quite stern and can get angry sometimes. Professor Sycamore seems to have encountered her before as he joked that she looks cute when she`s angry. When Rocket Gang stole Diantha`s Gardevoir, Minami showed up at the right time in a helicopter.

character.name: Corni
character.description: Korrina is the Gym Leader of the Shalour Gym in the Kalos region. She focuses on Fighting-type Pokémon and Trainers that defeat her receive the Rumble Badge.

character.name: Lucario (Corni)
character.description: Korrina`s Riolu had been together with Korrina since she was small. They played together every day, laughed, ate and sometimes they fought. They grew up like siblings. Korrina`s Riolu evolved into Korrina`s Lucario one day. Lucario and Korrina are soulmates. One day they met Ash Ketchum and Pikachu near Route 5 and they were their 99th straight battle. Korrina`s Lucario defeated Pikachu for their 99th victory and Korrina noted that Pikachu was a strong opponent. Rocket Gang noted that having a Lucario that could Mega Evolve and could defeat Pikachu was a Pokémon worth capturing. For a short time they managed to capture Korrina`s Lucario but Rocket Gang ended up being the 100th straight victory as they were sent off flying.

character.name: Concombre
character.description: Gurkinn is Korrina`s grandfather.

character.name: Luchabull (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Hawlucha was revealed in the 2nd opening and 2nd ending of the XY anime in Japan.

character.name: Hinoyakoma (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Fletchinder was revealed in the 2nd opening and 2nd ending of the XY anime in Japan. Ash`s Fletchling evolved into Ash`s Fletchinder during a battle against Nami`s Talonflame. Evolving into Fletchinder Nami challenged Ash Ketchum to a sky battle and initially chose Ash`s Fletchling to battle her but Nami`s Talonflame thought it was too weak to battle against and wanted to battle Ash`s Hawlucha instead. Ash Ketchum made a deal with her that if Ash`s Hawlucha defeated her Fiarrow, that Ash`s Fletchling could battle it also. Nami ended up winning that match and Ash`s Hawlucha was defeated. Not long after though, Nami`s Talonflame was captured by Rocket Gang and with the assistance of Ash`s Fletchling, it was set free. Nami`s Talonflame wanted to battle Ash`s Fletchling after the events of Rocket Gang`s interference proved to it that Ash`s Fletchling was a strong opponent despite its initial impression. Nami`s Talonflame ended up being defeated after Ash`s Fletchling evolved into Ash`s Fletchinder during the battle.

character.name: Sana
character.description: Shauna is a rival of the player in the Pokémon X and Y games for the Nintendo 3DS. She along with Tierno and Trevor are childhood friends who got their starter Pokémon from Professor Sycamore on the same day and then started their journey towards their respective dreams. They occasionally come together at events like the Pokémon Summer Camp to get each other up to speed on their journey. Her dream is to become the world`s number one Pokémon Performer. Every time she enters a Pokémon Center, she checks out the newest PokéVisions. Whenever she gets a new Pokémon or obtains a cute ribbon or something, she gets the urge to make a new PokéVision video. Shauna watched Serena`s PokéVision video and she recognized her at the Pokémon Summer Camp. She kept telling Trevor there was this really cute girl in the video and showed him Serena`s PokéVision numerous times. Shauna took a liking to Serena`s Fennekin and seeing it in the flesh was a great experience for her.

character.name: Trova
character.description: Trevor is a rival of the player in the Pokémon X and Y games for the Nintendo 3DS. He along with Tierno and Shauna are childhood friends who got their starter Pokémon from Professor Sycamore on the same day and then started their journey towards their respective dreams. They occasionally come together at events like the Pokémon Summer Camp to get each other up to speed on their journey. He documents Pokémon he meets by taking pictures and his dream is to meet every Pokémon registered in the Zukan. He hopes he will discover unknown Pokémon that aren`t in the Zukan. Upon meeting Ash Ketchum, Trevor wanted to know if Ash Ketchum had seen a lot of Pokémon from Kanto which Trevor had not seen before.

character.name: Tierno
character.description: Tierno is a rival of the player in the Pokémon X and Y games for the Nintendo 3DS. He along with Trevor and Shauna are childhood friends who got their starter Pokémon from Professor Sycamore on the same day and then started their journey towards their respective dreams. They occasionally come together at events like the Pokémon Summer Camp to get each other up to speed on their journey. Tierno is from from Hakudan City and he gets crushes on girls easily according to Shauna (XY). His dream is to form a dance unit with my Pokémon. The rhythm and steps of a dance can be applied in battles as well which trainers often witness first hand in battles with him. On the first day of the Pokémon Summer Camp, he was put in to Team Zenigame. He battled against Ash Ketchum and won. Tierno hoped that this win was the first step to the camp`s Hall of Fame.

character.name: Tairenar (Elle)
character.description: Elle`s Fennekin evolved into Elle`s Braixen while changing from a PokéVision creator to a Pokémon Performer. It has quickly become a major player. Elle still regularly uploads PokéVisions though despite participating in the tournaments. At the time of the Pokémon Summer Camp, Elle held the title of "Kalos Queen" as she had won each tournament three or more times and had entered the Master Class. Elle`s Braixen was seen at the award ceremony with her.

character.name: Yancham (Serena)
character.description: Serena`s Pancham was the second Pokémon that Serena obtained.

character.name: Monsieur Pierre
character.description: Monsieur Pierre was the host of the LaGoon Rookie Class Tripokalon Tournament. He introduced Mademoiselle Elle`s exhibition performance.

character.name: Luxio (Citron)
character.description: While taking a recreational stroll while struggling with his graduate research, Clemont encountered a Kolink in the park and quickly took it to Nurse Joy. It was quite weak so it took a while for it to recover but Nurse Joy made a suggestion that it would be nice if there was a place in the town where Electric Pokémon could freely absorb electric energy. This became Clemont`s project and he befriended Kolink. During his research and development stage for the Citronic Shower, Kolink often visited Clemont and tested the experiment. Upon graduation, Clemont was planning to ask Kolink to be his my partner and come with him to Miare. He even got a cake with blended just the right amount of sweetness for Kolink but Clemont was sidetracked by the Mayor of the town and he missed his meeting with Kolink. When Clemont returned to the town where he went to school, the Kolink had evolved into a Luxio at some point and was living underground near the power generating area for the city. It was angry with Clemont for not meeting with it that day. Working together to stop Rocket Gang from stealing the town`s power restored a part of that friendship they built before and Luxio decided it would finally partner with Clemont.

character.name: Hina
character.description: Heidi is a member of the Laplace Defense Corps (ラプラス防衛隊) which was formed one day after a thunderstorm, when the members found traces of something dragging itself through the forest only to discover an injured Laplace. Heidi acts as the leader of the Laplace Defense Corps and they were afraid of letting adults know where Laplace as because they thought Pokémon Hunters and Pokémon Merchants might want to capture it. They finally agreed to let Nurse Joy examine Laplace after Ash Ketchum and Clemont convinced them that Laplace could die if it was not properly treated. Despite their love for Laplace and wanting it to be around them, the Laplace Defense Corps helped it return to its home after it had been separated by a large rock blocking the river to the sea. After fending off Rocket Gang, Laplace was safely returned to its friends thanks in part to the Defense Corps efforts and they hoped it would visit them again when it was nearby.

character.name: Ken
character.description: Ken is a member of the Laplace Defense Corps (ラプラス防衛隊) which was formed one day after a thunderstorm, when the members found traces of something dragging itself through the forest only to discover an injured Laplace. Ken often gets words wrong when talking and if usually corrected by another person. The group was afraid of letting adults know where Laplace as because they thought Pokémon Hunters and Pokémon Merchants might want to capture it. They finally agreed to let Nurse Joy examine Laplace after Ash Ketchum and Clemont convinced them that Laplace could die if it was not properly treated. Despite their love for Laplace and wanting it to be around them, the Laplace Defense Corps helped it return to its home after it had been separated by a large rock blocking the river to the sea. After fending off Rocket Gang, Laplace was safely returned to its friends thanks in part to the Defense Corps efforts and they hoped it would visit them again when it was nearby.

character.name: Joe
character.description: Joe is a member of the Laplace Defense Corps (ラプラス防衛隊) which was formed one day after a thunderstorm, when the members found traces of something dragging itself through the forest only to discover an injured Laplace. The group was afraid of letting adults know where Laplace as because they thought Pokémon Hunters and Pokémon Merchants might want to capture it. They finally agreed to let Nurse Joy (Kalos) examine Laplace after Ash Ketchum and Clemont convinced them that Laplace could die if it was not properly treated. Despite their love for Laplace and wanting it to be around them, the Laplace Defense Corps helped it return to its home after it had been separated by a large rock blocking the river to the sea. After fending off Rocket Gang, Laplace was safely returned to its friends thanks in part to the Defense Corps efforts and they hoped it would visit them again when it was nearby.

character.name: Kaenjishi (Fleur-de-lis)
character.description: Lysandre`s Pyroar was first seen battling against Alan while he was searching for a Denryunite in some ruins and Lysandre challenged him to a battle where Alan could claim the stone if he won the battle. Alan lost the battle. It was seen once again when it broke up a battle between Alan (Kalos) and Steven Stone.

character.name: Metagross (Tsuwabuki Daigo)
character.description: Steven Stone`s Metagross can mega evolve into Mega Metagross. It was sent out to battle against Alan`s Charizard to which Manon noted it had the type disadvantage. The Mega Evolution battle was interrupted by Lysandre`s Pyroar before the match could be decided.

character.name: Nene
character.description: Nene is a Pokémon Tripokalon performer who was traveling through the Kalos region. While practicing for her performance with a Heartbreak theme, she encountered Serena and her friends and asked for their opinion on her performance. She was working hard to enter her first Tripokalon. She became a friend and rival of Serena`s. Serena suggested it might be good to synchronize Kamonegi`s and Muchul`s dancing more and Ash Ketchum suggested that she make the move Heart Stamp more flashy which she used midway through. Nene wrote the suggestions down and then wanted to see Serena`s performance and use it as a reference.

character.name: Kamonegi (Nene)
character.description: Nene`s Farfetch`d performs in Pokémon Tripokalon and was practicing when it got captured by Rocket Gang. It was able to use its stick to help determine which way they should go. It seems quite intelligent and sensible when it seemed a bit unsure of Nene`s decision to try and trade for Serena`s Pancham.

character.name: Muchul (Nene)
character.description: Nene`s Smoochum performs in Pokémon Tripokalon and was practicing when it got captured by Rocket Gang. It seemed to like Serena`s Pancham and the two of them did a dance together. Nene wanted to trade for Serena`s Pancham but she refused. Jessie tried to keep Nene`s Smoochum so she use it in her Tripokalon performances. Jessie noted that she she liked its lips.

character.name: Saizo
character.description: Saizo is a high-ranked ninja and the instructor assigned to Sanpei. He had a task for Sanpei and asked him to take a secret document containing ninja techniques that have been taught in their ninja village since olden times and deliver it to their allies. While Sanpei was attempting to complete his task, Saizo decided to test Sanpei to affirm how much he had grown on his journey. He dressed up as a masked ninja and attempted to steal the secret document. Sanpei though teamed up with Ash Ketchum and Saizo was impressed as he clearly saw that he communicated his thoughts as he faced many difficulties. After Sanpei safely finished the mission and Saizo revealed himself as the masked ninja, he told Sanpei that he would report back to their elder.

character.name: Gamenodes (Saizo)
character.description: Saizo`s Barbaracle battled against Sanpei and poisoned his Gekkouga after it was attempting to try to recover the document that was being transported as part of Sanpei`s testing. Saizo`s Barbaracle is one Saizo`s main Pokémon but Sanpei did not seem to recognize it.

character.name: Gekkouga (Sanpei)
character.description: Sanpei`s Greninja is the evolved form of Sanpei`s Frogadier. It evolved during the time that Sanpei first met Ash Ketchum and the time he was being tested by Saizo. Saizo had a task for Sanpei and Sanpei`s Greninja and he asked them to take a secret document containing ninja techniques that have been taught in their ninja village since olden times and deliver it to their allies. During a battle between Saizo`s Barbaracle, which at the time was the masked ninja`s Pokémon, Sanpei`s Greninja was poisoned. After Sanpei and Sanpei`s Greninja safely finished the mission and Saizo revealed himself as the masked ninja, he told Sanpei that he would report back to their elder about how well they performed together. Sanpei`s Greninja didn`t realize that masked ninja was Saizo and it had a very surprised look on its face when he was revealed.

character.name: Gekogashira (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Frogadier is the evolved form of Ash`s Froakie. It evolved during a battle with Saizo`s Barbaracle. As a result of evolving, it learned Aerial Ace. Bonnie was disappointed that she didn`t get to see it evolve and wanted it to turn back into a Froakie so she could see it evolve.

character.name: Numera (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Goomy was caught near Hiyoku City in the Kalos Region. It literally fell on Ash Ketchum`s head while he was walking in a rocky area after it dropped from the sky from the Swanna it had hitched a ride on. Ash`s Goomy is quick to take offense and as it is a Dragon Type Pokémon, it doesn`t like Fairy Type Pokémon like Clemont`s Dedenne. The habitat that Goomy was living in was invaded by a bunch of Pokémon and it escaped as a flock of Swanna fled the area. While on the Swanna, Ash`s Goomy got dehydrated. After consulting the dex, Ash Ketchum realized that Goomy like to live in damp, shady places, so its slimy body doesn`t dry out. It took Goomy to a nearby river to rehydrate. Team Rocket captured it and Pikachu but it was mainly Ash`s Goomy that allowed them to get away and fend them off. It made Pikachu`s fur coat slick enough to get through the cage and during Team Rocket`s attack, it Bided its time and sent the group flying away. Ash Ketchum realized that it wasn`t a weak Pokémon at all like the Dex said and he could feel its strong willpower. He asked it if it wanted to become as strong as Pikachu and to join him on his journey and it agreed to become part of the team.

character.name: Fukuji
character.description: Ramos is the gym leader of the Coumarine Gym and he gives trainers the Plant Badge for defeating him. He often drinks tea as a way to calm himself. He maintains the gym which is a very large tree. He weeds and prunes trees around his gym and sometimes asks visitors and challengers to assist him before their match like he did with Ash Ketchum. Despite struggling against Ramos`s Grass type Pokémon, Ash Ketchum managed to claim victory and get his fourth badge.

character.name: Gogoat (Fukuji)
character.description: Ramos` Gogoat was the third and final Pokémon revealed in the gym match against Ash Ketchum where it faced off against Ash`s Frogadier in the last match up of the battle. Despite using a lot of healing moves, it proved to be an ineffective battle strategy against Ash`s Frogadier as Ash Ketchum observed calmly and carefully and a well timed Water Pulse was able to defeat Ramos` Gogoat. Ramos rides around his ranch on Gogoat. When Team Rocket was in the area, Ramos` Gogoat was used to stop their mecha.

character.name: Cleffy (Monsieur Pierre)
character.description: Monsieur Pierre`s Klefki was first seen during the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament where winners of the Rookie Class were awarded a Princess Key. It was holding on to the Princess Key around its keyring. After each theme performance, it would go to the door of each performer to unlock it.

character.name: Armelle
character.description: Armelle is a Tripokalon performer who was first seen participating in the first Pokémon Styling round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. She was up against Shauna and Jessie but the audience did not vote enough for her, so Shauna advanced to the next stage and Armelle was eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Trimmien (Armelle)
character.description: Armelle`s Furfrou participated in the first Pokémon Styling round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. Armelle styled it to look like a Pharaoh Trim Furfrou for that round. It was up against Shauna`s Bulbasaur and Jessie`s Pumpkaboo but the audience did not vote enough for it, so Shauna advanced to the next stage and Armelle was eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Blanche
character.description: Blanche is a Tripokalon performer who was first seen participating in the second Pokémon Styling round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. She faced off against Serena and Clarice and advanced to the next round by defeating them with enough votes from the audience. Serena was eliminated from contention with this win by Blanche. In the final free performance round, a stage of originality created by a combination of performance and moves, she ended up loosing to Shauna.

character.name: Nyaonix (Blanche)
character.description: Blanche`s Meowstic participated in the free performances round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament which was a stage of originality. Unfortunately its performance wasn`t good enough as Shauna won the tournament.

character.name: Nyaonix (Blanche)
character.description: Blanche`s Meowstic participated in the theme performance and free performance rounds of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. In the theme performance round, it managed to get the most votes and Blanche advanced but eliminated Serena. It performed with Blanche`s Meowstic in the free performance round but unfortunately their performance wasn`t good enough as Shauna won the tournament.

character.name: Clarice
character.description: Clarice is a Tripokalon performer who was first seen participating in the second Pokémon Styling round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. She faced off against Serena and Blanche but was eliminated from contention as Blanche won the round.

character.name: Yayakoma (Clarice)
character.description: Clarice`s Fletchling participated in the second Pokémon Styling round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. It faced off against Serena`s Fennekin and Blanche`s Meowstic♀ but was defeated as it did not get enough votes from the audience.

character.name: Flabebe (Sana)
character.description: Shauna`s Flabébé is an Orange Flower form Flabébé. It performed with Shauna`s Bulbasaur in the final free performance round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament which was a stage of originality created by a combination of performance and moves. It helped gain enough points with its performance that Shauna was able to win the tournament.

character.name: Yashio
character.description: Yashio returned to the Tripokalon world as a judge during the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. Reporters were waiting for her at the venue but she did not make a statement. She watched the tournament from a private box but wasn`t impressed with any of the contestants and noted to her secretary that there wouldn`t be another girl like Elle but then she saw Serena crying on a nearby pier with her Pokémon.

character.name: Rentorar (Citron)
character.description: Clemont`s Luxray is the evolved form of Clemont`s Luxio. It evolved at the Kalos Power Plant while it was under the control of Team Rocket and Clemont was trying to save it. It grew significantly during its evolving and Clemont had to hold onto it while it evolved fully. It learned to use Electric Terrain upon evolving which powers up Electric types and all the Pokémon in the plant fought back against Team Rocket.

character.name: Mafoxy (Elle)
character.description: Elle`s Delphox is the evolved form of Elle`s Braixen. It evolved sometime after its appearance at the award ceremony for the Kalos Queen title. It was revealed in a double battle against Serena`s Fennekin.

character.name: Tairenar (Serena)
character.description: Serena`s Braixen is the evolved form of Serena`s Fennekin. It evolved during a double battle against Elle shortly before the battle was called off as Elle had to leave. Serena asked Tairenar to bear with her from now on after it evolved.

character.name: Frefuwan (Elle)
character.description: Elle`s Aromatisse was revealed during a double battle with Elle`s Delphox against Serena. The battle was interrupted though by a phone call to Elle and ended in a no decision.

character.name: Shouta
character.description: Sawyer is a Pokémon Trainer that battled against Clemont in a Gym Battle at the Lumiose Gym. Only the end of the battle was shown where he was defeated by Clemont. He seems to be a beginning trainer as he was surprised how strong Gym Leaders were but was thankful for the Experience. He took notes from the battle for future reference. His name was confirmed in the Japanese closed captions. His first appearance in the anime was in the third Japanese opening. In the original airing of the English dub of XY64, the closed captions listed his name as Scottie. In XY73, he is introduced as Sawyer. He was later seen attempting to challenge Valerie at the Laverre Gym but he unfortunately arrived on the day she was debuting her Furisode Collection and was told he couldn`t battle her that day. He reunited with Clemont who introduced him to Ash and company. While waiting for Serena and Bonnie to look at the clothes, Ash challenged Sawyer to a battle and the two decided on a Double Battle. Despite a type advantage, Ash`s battles are unpredictable because he negates type disadvantages like they are nothing and due to this and Sawyer lack of Double Battle experience, Ash easily won the match. He was grateful to battle though and gain the experience. As part of an established custom at Valerie`s cloth collection show debuts, Valerie picks one person to battle with. She chose Sawyer and told him if he defeated her, she would give him a Gym badge. Unfortunately for Sawyer, he was unable to defeat her but was grateful for the experience and vowed to return to defeat her.

character.name: Numelgon (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Goodra is the evolved form of Ash`s Sliggoo. It evolved just after using Rain Dance to help put out the fire that was caused by Rocket Gang`s Automatic Pikachu Catcher exploded. The Rain Dance got heavier and was able to put out the fire. As a result of evolving, it also learned Dragon Pulse which it used to quickly blast Rocket Gang away. Shortly after the Rocket Gang battle, it had a double battle with Pikachu against Tierno. Ash`s Goodra`s Bide proved effective in the battle and the two of them were able to defeat Tierno.

character.name: Runpappa (Tierno)
character.description: Tierno`s Ludicolo is one of the new companions Tierno got after the summer camp ended. Tierno has taught it his rhythm strategy and dance moves.

character.name: Raichuu (Tierno)
character.description: Tierno`s Raichu is one of the new companions Tierno got after the summer camp ended. Tierno has taught it his rhythm strategy and dance moves. Tierno revealed it when he thought that since Ash Ketchum was going to challenge the Miare Gym, it might be better for him to train with an Electric type as his opponent. It was captured by Team Rocket and shocked the other Pokémon in the cage while attempting to escape. After escaping and reuniting Tierno, it participated in a double battle against Pikachu and Ash`s Goodra. It got knocked out by Dragon Pulse.

character.name: Kenzou
character.description: Kenzo works at a natural wetlands area in the Kalos region. He identified Ash`s Goodra as Ash`s Goomy, the Goomy that used to live in the wetlands. He explained to Ash Ketchum and his friends that Ash`s Goomy used to live in those wetlands in peace with its friends, but a disturbance occurred over a spring in the area that has a soothing effect on a Pokémon`s mind and body. Kenzo has a station in the wetlands which he maintains along with a boardwalk. He believe that humans should not interfere with wild Pokémon.

character.name: Madatsubomi (Kenzou)
character.description: Kenzo`s Bellsprout works at a natural wetlands area in the Kalos region with Kenzo. It was the first to identify Ash`s Goodra as Ash`s Goomy, the Goomy that used to live in the wetlands and pointed it out to Kenzo.

character.name: Maache
character.description: Valerie is the Gym Leader of Laverre City Gym and she specializes in Fairy-type Pokémon. Trainers that defeat her receive the Fairy Badge. Valerie is also a well known clothes designer and she showcases her designs at her company store which also doubles as the gym. In the Japanese version, Mâche speaks in a kyo-kotoba dialect, commonly known as the Kyoto dialect. While Ash Ketchum and company were visiting the gym, Valerie was showcasing her Furisode Collection which featured an elegant dress with a Marilli pattern and dresses with Florges and Lisyan patterns which were worn by Serena and Bonnie respectfully. The original models could not make it so Valerie asked them to model for her. As part of an established custom of her runway shows, Valerie picks one person to battle with. She chose Scottie and told him if he defeated her, she would give him a Gym badge. Unfortunately for Scottie, he was unable to defeat her but was grateful for the experience and vowed to return to defeat her.

character.name: Shushup (Maache)
character.description: As part of an established custom at Valerie`s cloth collection show debuts, Valerie picks one person to battle with. She chose Scottie and told him if he defeated her, she would give him a Gym badge. Scottie`s Bagon was sent out to battle against Valerie`s Spritzee. Unfortunately for Scottie, he was unable to defeat her but was grateful for the experience and vowed to return to defeat her. After Valerie`s Sylveon was defeated, Valerie`s Spritzee was matched up against Ash`s Fletchinder. The match was dominated by Valerie`s Spritzee Trick Room. Ash Ketchum kept instructing Fletchinder to use Flame Charge despite being under Trick Room`s effects which actually has the opposite effect and lowers its speed. Ash`s Fletchinder kept enduring attacks until the effects of Trick Room had warn off and he hoped that he could settle the match in one go but unfortunately the strategy didn`t pay off as Valerie`s Spritzee endured the Giga Impact and Steel Wing and knocked out Fletchinder with a Moon Blast. In the final match up, Ash`s Hawlucha was sent out to face a weakened Spritzee. Once again Trick Room dominated the match-up but Ash`s Hawlucha had learned a new move, X-Scissor which was able to shatter Trick Room and its effects on the playing field. Valerie was surprised and it wasn`t much later that Ash`s Hawlucha took over the match and knocked out Valerie`s Spritzee with a powerful High Jump Kick.

character.name: Kucheat (Maache)
character.description: Valerie`s Mawile attempted to cheer up Valerie when she was concerned about finding some models for her Florges and Lisyan patterns that were part of the Furisode Collection.

character.name: Barrierd (Maache)
character.description: Valerie`s Mr. Mime attempted to cheer up Valerie when she was concerned about finding some models for her Florges and Lisyan patterns that were part of the Furisode Collection.

character.name: Nymphia (Maache)
character.description: Valerie`s Sylveon attempted to cheer up Valerie when she was concerned about finding some models for her Florges and Lisyan patterns that were part of the Furisode Collection. During the Gym battle against Ash Ketchum, it faced off against Ash`s Fletchinder in the first match up. Valerie talked to her Sylveon in Pokémon language and it was able to more or less understand what she wanted to do. Valerie`s Sylveon being a Fairy type is delicate but strong. It used its tail ribbons to its advantage during the battle to capture Ash`s Fletchinder from moving about but he countered that but charging right into Sylveon with Flame Charge. The battle came to a climax when the two charged at each other with Giga Impact and Steel Wing but Ash`s Fletchinder came out victorious and knocked out Valerie`s Sylveon to win the first match-up.

character.name: Juptile (Shouta)
character.description: Sawyer`s Grovyle is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Treecko. It evolved in a battle against Ash where it also learned Leaf Blade. Despite evolving, learning a new move and becoming stronger, it couldn`t overcome the EXP that Ash`s Frogadier had and was quickly knocked out with a blast from Water Pulse. Sawyer vowed to Juptile that they should become stronger. Sawyer`s Grovyle became Ash`s Frogadier rival after that battle as the two locked eyes in anticipation of their rematch battle.

character.name: Peroream (Shouta)
character.description: Sawyer`s Slurpuff was revealed when it was sent out to find Sawyer lost battle notebook. Peroream`s sense of smell is said to be a 100 million times better than a human`s so it was used to sniff out where the battle notebook was located. It quickly found it and took it away from Rocket Gang. Later on in the day, it faced Ash`s Hawlucha in a battle. It had Electro Ball prepared for dealing with Flying types but Ash`s Hawlucha dodged the attack and while trying to figure out what to do next, Ash`s Hawlucha knocked out Sawyer`s Slurpuff with Flying Press.

character.name: Onbat (Satoshi)
character.description: While training in a forest near Hyakkoku City, Ash`s Hawlucha found an egg which he brought to Ash Ketchum. He decided to go back to where it was found to see if there was a nest but by the time he got there, the egg started to hatch. Ash`s Fletchinder was instrumental in helping the egg hatch as it has an Ability called "Flame Body" that makes eggs hatch faster. Ash Ketchum and his friends didn`t know what kind of Pokémon egg it was until Noibat hatched. Noibat cries by using the move Supersonic which is quite deafening and it won`t stop until Ash Ketchum pets it as it thinks he`s its parent. Its favorite food is fruit and it can tell the ripeness of a fruit. Ash`s Hawlucha and Ash`s Fletchinder helped it learn to fly by teaching it first how to glide on the wind. After an encounter with Rocket Gang in which Ash`s Hawlucha protected Noibat it returned to Ash Ketchum and he asked Noibat if it wanted to travel with him and it agreed.

character.name: Pumpjin (Musashi)
character.description: Jessie`s Gourgeist was first revealed in the Movie 18 short poster and then later appeared in the third XY ending. Jessie`s Gourgeist is the evolved form of Jessie`s Pumpkaboo. Count Pump, the master of a castle in the Kalos region had been searching for a mate for his prince. The prince had fallen in love at first sight with Jessie`s Pumpkaboo and Pump, ordered his butler to invite them to the castle to be introduced and to have a meal. Upon meeting them, Pump noticed that Jessie`s Pumpkaboo was a truly excellent Bakeccha and that he`d never seen such a big one before. He then asked Jessie to trade her Bakeccha so that the prince could wed her. Despite initial hesitation, Jessie agreed and traded her Bakeccha for his Kucheat because he told her that it is a Pokémon reported to mega evolve. During the trade process, Jessie`s Pumpkaboo evolved into Jessie`s Gourgeist. Pump then realized that Pumpjin is a trade evolution and the prince liked the way Bakeccha looked better.
