Jessie then realized that the bond between Pokémon and Trainer was strong between those two as she remember that it nursed her the whole night when she had a fever, fed her with ground fruit and was the only one to congratulate her on her birthday when everyone else forgot.

character.name: Fiarrow (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Talonflame is the evolved form of Ash`s Fletchinder. It evolved during a battle against Moltres at Mount Ardor. An attack was heading towards Ash Ketchum and the others and in a burst of adrenaline to go protect them, it also triggered it to evolve.

character.name: Lizardo (Trova)
character.description: Trevor`s Charmeleon is the evolved form of Trevor`s Charmander. It evolved sometime after the Summer Camp and it was instrumental in helping Trevor defeat Viola to get the Bug Badge. It`s personality did not change as a result of evolving into Charmeleon. Ash Ketchum and friends hear it in the bushes and he realized that it was in a battling mood so he asked Trevor to battle. Ash`s Fletchinder was sent out to battle it to help cool down its temperament at the time. The two traded blows until Ash`s Fletchinder was able to finish it off with a powerful Steel Wing. Despite loosing the battle, Trevor`s Charmeleon felt refreshed after the battle.

character.name: Eievui (Serena)
character.description: Serena`s Eevee is a very Timid Pokémon that is shy to be in front of people and other Pokémon. Serena first saw it dancing on some rocks in a field near Hyakkoku City. She thought it was very cute and that it was light on its feet and it seemed to be having fun. It was very shy, so she lured it by putting out Pofflés that she made and then did her Tripokalon performance to show Eievui her feelings. Jessie also took a liking to it and also tried to get it by force though. She thought it had exceptional talent that would add grace to her magnificent performances. Serena and her Pokémon protected it for a bit but when Jessie`s Gourgeist used Seed Bomb on Serena, Eevee came to the rescue and used Protect to stop her from being harmed. After being saved by Eievui, Serena asked it again if it would join her on her journey and it agreed. She captured it with her Poké Ball and then let it out to meet all the other Pokémon. It seemed to like Clemont`s Bunnelby but Clemont`s Chespin got a bit upset when it didn`t initially like it.

character.name: Fushigisou (Sana)
character.description: Shauna`s Ivysaur is the evolved form of Shauna`s Bulbasaur. It evolved sometime after the Hiyoku Tripokalon Tournament. To help Serena`s Eevee overcome its shyness and to learn how to battle, Shauna`s Ivysaur teamed up with it in a tag battle against Ash and Tierno. The battle was cut short though as Serena got an idea for a new performance and wanted to practice it immediately.

character.name: Kamex (Tierno)
character.description: Tierno`s Blastoise is the evolved form of Tierno`s Wartortle. It evolved sometime after the training session with Ash when it got captured by Team Rocket. Since that time, Tierno and Tierno`s Wartortle had been improving their dancing and battling, which caused it to evolve. To help Serena`s Eevee overcome its shyness and to learn how to battle, Tierno`s Blastoise teamed up with Pikachu in a tag battle against Shauna`s Ivysaur and Serena`s Eevee. The battle was cut short though as Serena got an idea for a new performance and wanted to practice it immediately. Tierno`s Blastoise and Pikachu then had a battle but only the start of it was shown in the episode.

character.name: Lily
character.description: Lily is a Tripokalon Performer who participated in the Hyakkoku Tripokalon Tournament in the Kalos region. She was eliminated in the first quiz question round when she was matched up against Serena.

character.name: Solrock (Lily)
character.description: Lily`s Solrock is a Tripokalon Performer who participated in the Hyakkoku Tripokalon Tournament in the Kalos region. It was eliminated in the first quiz question round when it was matched up against Serena`s Pancham and Nene`s Farfetch`d and was unable to return the ball back to Lily in time to answer any of the quiz questions.

character.name: Carrie
character.description: Carrie is one of the gym trainers in the Anistar Gym and also one of Olympia`s higher trained students alongside Sheryl. The Forewarning Carrie was first seen observing Olympia`s vision about the future of the Kalos region and having been unsettled about the prediction, she rushes off before Olympia can explain what it meant. As Professor Sycamore arrived at the Anistar Sundial, she hastily asked him what he was up to and begun to attack them with her Sigilyph, destroying their research equipment. Ash vs Carrie When Ash and the rest of the group arrived to see what was going on, she was shocked at his arival and sent out her Sableye to attack them with Power Gem. She was then involved in a double battle with Ash and was easily defeated. Once defeated, she attempted to send out a third, unknown Pokémon however she was stopped by Olympia`s Meowstic, who gave the PokéBall to Olympia. She was then reprimanded for her actions and was made to apologize to both Sycamore and Ash for the trouble she caused.

character.name: Pachira
character.description: Malva is the Holo Caster news reporter and is also a member of the Kalos Elite Four. While at the Hyakkoku City Pokémon Center, Ash and his friends heard a broadcast with Mega Evolution-related news. She announced that Professor Sycamore would be visiting the sundial that day to conduct an investigation. She explained that according to one theory, the sundial came from space and that it is still shrouded in mysteries, but recent studies had revealed a deep connection to Mega Stones. His conclusions based on the investigation of the sundial were reported by her as being highly anticipated.

character.name: Sheryl
character.description: Sheryl is a Psychic-type Pokémon Trainer who is also Olympia`s apprentice. She scolded Carrie for acting out on her own arbitrary interpretations of the future Olympia saw in regards to Ash and Professor Sycamore. She humbly begged for their pardon for their rude actions. Sheryl explained that Olympia learns about the future by being guided by the voice of the stars. The incident off the coast of Houen was also allowed he to predict the incident with Groudon and Kyogre beforehand. Even though the world suffered from abnormal weather, her prediction enabled people in the Kalos region to take all possible countermeasures, so nothing serious happened.

character.name: Gojika
character.description: Olympia is the Gym Leader of the Anistar Gym and she awards trainers that defeat her the Psychic Badge. She is a strong Psychic who can see the past and the future through the use of Future Sight. Sheryl explained that Olympia learns about the future by being guided by the voice of the stars. The incident off the coast of Houen was also allowed he to predict the incident with Groudon and Kyogre beforehand. Even though the world suffered from abnormal weather, her prediction enabled people in the Kalos region to take all possible countermeasures, so nothing serious happened.

character.name: Nyaonix (Gojika)
character.description: Olympia`s Meowstic is one of the two Meowstic that Olympia has as her main partners. It battled against Ash`s Talonflame and Ash`s Frogadier in a double battle gym fight. Its Ability is Prankster which allows it to preemptively activate supporting moves such as Light Screen. That`s why it could protect the female before the attack from Ash and his Pokémon could hit.

character.name: Nyaonix (Gojika)
character.description: Olympia`s Meowstic is one of the two Meowstic that Olympia has as her main partners. It battled against Ash`s Talonflame and Ash`s Frogadier in a double battle gym fight. Its Ability is Keen Eye which makes it extremely difficult for opponents to evade moves.

character.name: Hellgar (Pachira)
character.description: Malva`s Houndoom was the final Pokémon that Alain`s Charizard faced in his 10 straight Mega Pokémon battle. Malva`s Houndoom can mega evolve and Malva said that flames are a meal for it. Despite having a stamina advantage having been rested unlike Alain`s Charizard who was tired from the previous 9 battles, Houndoom ended up loosing the battle.

character.name: Puni-chan
character.description: Squishy was one of multiple Zygarde`s captured by Flare Gang to be experimented on at their lab. Mairin`s Chespin managed to enter the room that it was being held in and interfered enough for it to escape but not before Mairin`s Chespin was critically injured. While on the run, it found its way into Bonnie bag. The Pokédex couldn`t identify its species so Bonnie decided to call it Squishy because it felt squishy. While attempting to flee from Flare Gang recapturing it, it transformed into its 10% Forme to protect itself from being captured. Professor Sycamore was unable to identify the species as well.

character.name: Gekkouga (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Greninja was first revealed in the October 2015 issue of Corocoro. Ash`s Greninja is the evolved form of Ash`s Frogadier and it takes on a mysterious new appearance in the latest season of Pocket Monsters XY&Z. Ash-Greninja is the form that Greninja takes when the bond between it and Ash is raised to the limit. The strength of their bond changes Greninja`s appearance and it takes on the characteristic look of Ash`s attire. This phenomenon is also said to have happened just once several hundred years ago in the Kalos region, but it remains shrouded in mystery.

character.name: Xerosicy
character.description: Xerosic is a scientist for Flare Gang. He was studying the Zygarde they had captured until Squishy managed to escape. He sent other members of Flare Gang to capture it.

character.name: Correa
character.description: Celosia is a member of Flare Gang. Xerosic tasked her with capturing Squishy. She encountered Ash and his friends who stopped her from capturing it in their first battle.

character.name: Momiji
character.description: Mable is a member of Flare Gang. Xerosic tasked her with capturing Z-2, a Zygarde, but she failed to capture it.

character.name: Akebi
character.description: Aliana is a member of Flare Gang. Xerosic tasked her with capturing the Z-2 Zygarde after Mable was unsuccessful in doing so.

character.name: Bara
character.description: Bryony is a member of Flare Gang. Xerosic tasked her with capturing the Z-1 Zygarde, Squishy, after was unsuccessful in doing so.

character.name: Dorapion (Correa)
character.description: Celosia`s Drapion is a member of Flare Gang and accompanies Celosia on her missions. While attempting to capture the Z-1 Zygarde Squishy, it battled against Pikachu and Scottie`s Grovyle and they managed to stop it from taking Squishy back to Xerosic for further study.

character.name: Kirikizan (Bara)
character.description: Bryony`s Bisharp is a member of Flare Gang and accompanies Bryony on her missions. While attempting to capture the Z-1 Zygarde Squishy, it was knocked out after Squishy transformed into its 10% Forme and had to fall back.

character.name: Hellgar (Momiji)
character.description: Mable`s Houndoom is a member of Flare Gang and accompanies Mable on her missions. While attempting to capture the Z-2 Zygarde, it got knocked out and the Zygarde got away.

character.name: Tsutomu
character.description: Tsutomu is a young boy that was concerned about his auntie Nurse Joy and Nurse Joy`s Audino fighting. He met Ash and his friends and overheard them talking about trying to convince them to stop fighting. He brought them into the back of the Pokémon Center through a window so they could help out.

character.name: Keromatsu (Sanpei)
character.description: Sanpei`s Froakie evolved into Sanpei`s Frogadier sometime after it left Ninja Village on its journey and the first encounter with Ash and his friends. Nihei specifically noted that Sanpei`s Froakie had evolved into Sanpei`s Greninja to which Sanpei said that it had become quite potent. Sanpei`s Froakie was seen in a picture in Sanpei`s room in the Ninja Village. None of Sanpei`s Froakie`s original moves can be confirmed.

character.name: Hanzo
character.description: Hanzo was the chieftain of the Ninja Village until he passed on that roll to Ippei when he retired at the villages festival. He was captured by Kagetomo who wanted to take control of the village but Hanzo was rescued by Ippei and the others from the village. As a leader of the Village, he would give advice to the Ninja`s and villagers as well as train and protect them. Due to his age, he decided that the roll needed to be passed on to someone else. Kagetomo at one point was considered the favorite for the roll but he strayed from Hanzo`s teachings and the mission of a ninja to keep training together with Pokémon, to pursue the potential of Pokémon and to utilize it for the sake of the world, for the sake of others. Hanzo refused to give the ninja symbol to Kagetomo for those reasons. After retiring, Hanzo stayed at the Ninja Village.

character.name: Kagetomo
character.description: Kagetomo is a ninja that was trained in the Ninja Village until he decided that he wanted to have enough power to rule over the world. He was captured Hanzo and wanted to start by taking control of the village to be their chieftain. Kagetomo at one point was considered the favorite for the roll of the chieftain but he strayed from Hanzo`s teachings and the mission of a ninja to keep training together with Pokémon, to pursue the potential of Pokémon and to utilize it for the sake of the world, for the sake of others. Hanzo refused to give the ninja symbol to Kagetomo for those reasons. Ippei defeated Kagetomo in a Pokémon battle and as a result, Kagetomo realized he wasn`t strong enough yet but he also had a change of heart. He wanted to reconsider and rediscipline himself as he couldn`t get Hanzo`s words out of his head about use his powers for the sake of others. He then said he wanted to see what society is striving for.

character.name: Shinobu
character.description: Shinobu was chieftain Hanzo`s errand girl. Bonnie thought that she would be the perfect wife for her big brother Clemont until she revealed that she was disguising her actual looks. She is in fact 100 years old. Hanzo always thought that Shinobu`s tea was the greatest. She went with the other villagers to rescue Hanzo from Kagetomo and battled with Clemont and Serena to take on the ninja corps underlings.

character.name: Heidayu
character.description: Heidayu was a member of Kagetomo`s ninja corps and he pledged eternal loyalty to him. While the rest of the ninja corps captured Hanzo from the ninja village, he stalled and bought enough time for them to complete that task. When the people from the Ninja Village came to rescue Hanzo, Heidayu battled against Ash and Sanpei. He lead for most the battle until Ash`s Frogadier evolved into Ash`s Greninja and became much stronger. Ippei defeated Kagetomo in a Pokémon battle and as a result, Kagetomo realized he wasn`t strong enough yet but he also had a change of heart. He wanted to reconsider and rediscipline himself as he couldn`t get Hanzo`s words out of his head about use his powers for the sake of others. He then said he wanted to see what society is striving for. Heidayu said he`d follow Kagetomo anywhere.

character.name: Lepardas (Shinobu)
character.description: Shinobu`s Liepard was sent out to battle against the Ninja Corps underlings near the summit of Mount Otori in order to help rescue Hanzo.

character.name: Kirikizan (Heidayu)
character.description: Heidayu`s Bisharp is an extremely strong Pokémon that can often battle multiple opponents on its own. Heidayu`s was a member of Kagetomo`s ninja corps and he pledged eternal loyalty to him and Kirikizan is loyal to Heidayu. While the rest of the ninja corps captured Hanzo from the ninja village, Heidayu`s Bisharp strong battling stalled and bought enough time for them to complete that task. When the people from the Ninja Village came to rescue Hanzo, Heidayu`s Bisharp battled against Ash`s Frogadier, Pikachu and Sanpei`s Greninja. It lead for most the battle until Ash`s Frogadier evolved into Ash`s Greninja and became much stronger and Heidayu`s Bisharp wasn`t able to contain them.

character.name: Manyula (Kagetomo)
character.description: Ippei`s Greninja is Ippei`s main Pokémon and strongest combatant of the ninja village. Kagetomo`s Weavile was summoned to battle against Ippei`s Greninja. Hanzo noted that in terms of speed and the power of their moves, they were evenly matched and perhaps Kagetomo`s Weavile might be a bit stronger but Ippei had his brothers and the ninja villageres for support, something that Kagetomo didn`t have. Ippei defeated Kagetomo in a Pokémon battle and as a result, Kagetomo realized he wasn`t strong enough yet but he also had a change of heart.

character.name: Gothimu (Nene)
character.description: Nene`s Gothita was revealed just before the start of the Renri Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. She obtained it some time before the Tripokalon but after her last encounter with Serena at the Hyakkoku Tripokalon Tournament. It participated in the Renri Town Tripokalon Tournament`s first stage theme performance where it performed while making Pofflés and Meowth noted that the colors used on the Pofflé where the colors gothlolis use. It also participated in the free performances but it wasn`t good enough to defeat Jessie to get the Princess Key.

character.name: Livolt (Correa)
character.description: Celosia`s Manectric was sent out to chase after the 10% forme of Squishy which was trying to escape capture in the Terminus Cave. It was forced into a battle against Ash who stopped it from capturing Zygarde.

character.name: Lepardas (Bara)
character.description: Bryony`s Liepard was sent out to chase after the 10% forme of Squishy which was trying to escape capture in the Terminus Cave. It was forced into a battle against Ash who stopped it from capturing Zygarde.

character.name: Nymphia (Serena)
character.description: Serena`s Sylveon is the evolved form of Serena`s Eevee. It`s evolution was first hinted at with an ad from the karaoke company Cote d`Azur. During a Double Battle against James` Inkay and Miette`s Slurpuff at the dance party battle round hosted by Monsieur Pierre, Serena`s Eevee was knocked down along with Pikachu. Serena, who was worried for it, came over to give her Eevee some strength and during that time it began to evolve. It wrapped its ribbon-like feelers around the arm of its beloved Trainer Serena and learned the move Fairy Wind in the process. Serena`s Sylveon was able to fight back and win the match.

character.name: Manyula (Momiji)
character.description: Mable`s Weavile was tasked with capturing Z2. It battled against the Zygarde and Rocket Gang in order to complete the task of capturing it.

character.name: Crimgan (Akebi)
character.description: Aliana`s Druddigon was tasked with capturing Z2. It battled against the Zygarde and Rocket Gang in order to complete the task of capturing it.

character.name: Ichigaya-hakase
character.description: Professor Ichigaya is a scientist that worked at the Ichigaya Laboratory in the Kalos region near Eisetsu Gym where there was desolate land. His grandson is Hiro and he created the the robot Robon. He died sometime ago from an incurable illness but left instructions for those that visited his laboratory to understand his work. He researched environments in which Pokémon and people can live in happiness. The area he was working in was once a beautiful forest blessed with abundant nature and many wild Pokémon lived there. Just before he was about to look for the cause of the problem, he was struck with an incurable illness. He somehow managed to complete the development of Robon, a robot that can renaturate the forest. Robon and Brigarron were his last hope and he asked that if they were ever in trouble, he hoped someone to help them out.

character.name: Brigarron (Ichigaya-hakase)
character.description: Professor Ichigaya`s Chesnaught lives and works at the Ichigaya Laboratory in the Kalos region near Eisetsu Gym where there was desolate land. He is continuing the work of the professor as he died sometime ago from an incurable illness but left instructions for those that visited his laboratory to understand his work and for Brigarron to continue working with Robon. often comes to check up on it and Brigarron initially thought Ash and his friends where there to interfere with the work. It protects Robon even though Professor Ichigaya is no longer around. When Rocket Gang severely damaged Robon, Professor Ichigaya`s Chesnaught got extremely angry and broke through the reinforced rings to send them flying off.

character.name: Hiro
character.description: Hiro is Professor Ichigaya grandson. He visits the Ichigaya Laboratory in the Kalos region near Eisetsu Gym to check on Professor Ichigaya`s Chesnaught and Robon. The day Clemont and his friends were traveling through the area, he met them at the lab and explained the situation after Professor Ichigaya`s Chesnaught mistakenly attacked them. With their help, they were able to expand upon his grandpa`s work and discover that a large rock was blocking the underwater aquifer.

character.name: Robon
character.description: Robon is a robot that Professor Ichigaya made to help him with his research and scientific work. The last thing Professor Ichigaya did was finish creating Robon before he died. Professor Ichigaya researched environments in which Pokémon and people can live in happiness. The area he was working in was once a beautiful forest blessed with abundant nature and many wild Pokémon lived there. Just before he was about to look for the cause of the problem, he was struck with an incurable illness. He somehow managed to complete the development of Robon, a robot that can renaturate the forest. Robon and Brigarron were his last hope and he asked that if they were ever in trouble, he hoped someone to help them out. When Rocket Gang severely damaged Robon, Professor Ichigaya`s Chesnaught got extremely angry and broke through the reinforced rings to send them flying off. Clemont though was able to fix it at the lab and it was reactivated. It was then able to use its Rock removal circuit to destroy the rock and allow the water vein to make the area fertile again. It continues to work in the area now by planting seeds and watering the seedlings.

character.name: Amelia
character.description: Amelia is a Pokémon Performer and a vigilant student who was first seen participating in the Frey Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. She`s the daughter of a prestigious family in Frey City and has completed lessons in a wide variety of fields with excellent grades. She hired a talent agent to attempt to convince Yashio to become her producer but she only evaluates people that she could see perform herself and she ended up telling Amelia that due to her loss to Serena, she could tell she didn`t completely have her whole heart into performing in Tripokalon. Serena first met Amelia in the waiting room when she was told that the show was about to start. Amelia performed in the last group in the theme performances and ended up being the last person to proceed to the free performance after using Attract on the Sihorn to drawn them to her. In the free performance, Clemont noted that Amelia was the favorite to win the tournament and Clemont`s Chespin got affected by Attract. Despite her excellent performance, she lost the tournament to Serena.

character.name: Hakuryuu (Amelia)
character.description: Amelia`s Dragonair is alternate-colored and performed in the theme and free rounds of the Frey Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. Despite performing well, Serena managed to get more votes to win the tournament.

character.name: Eifie (Amelia)
character.description: Amelia`s Espeon is alternate-colored and performed in the theme and free rounds of the Frey Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. Despite performing well, Serena managed to get more votes to win the tournament.

character.name: Cal
character.description: Cal is a Pokémon Performer who was attempting to become the Kalos Queen. Her name was first confirmed in the Japanese closed captions of XYZ 16 but she had appeared in previous tournaments before participating in the first round of the theme performances against Serena at the Frey Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. She lost the round due to Serena`s experience with Sihorn and was therefore eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Kazari
character.description: Kazari is a Pokémon Performer who was attempting to become the Kalos Queen. She was first seen participating in the first round of the theme performances against Serena at the Frey Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. She lost the round due to Serena`s experience with Sihorn and was therefore eliminated from the tournament.

character.name: Zuruggu (Cal)
character.description: Cal`s Scraggy is a Pokémon Performer who was attempting to help Cal become the Kalos Queen. It participated in the first round of the theme performances against Serena at the Frey Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. It lost the round and was therefore eliminated from the tournament due to the fact it wasn`t able to attract enough of the Sihorn and Serena`s experience with Sihorn gave her a bit of an advantage.

character.name: Dredear (Kazari)
character.description: Kazari`s Lilligant is a Pokémon Performer who was attempting to help Kazari become the Kalos Queen. It was first seen participating in the first round of the theme performances against Serena at the Frey Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. It lost the round and was therefore eliminated from the tournament due to the fact it wasn`t able to attract enough of the Sihorn and Serena`s experience with Sihorn.

character.name: Schullin
character.description: Schullin is a Pokémon Performer that competed in the Glorio Tripokalon Master Class Tournament. She had obtained the required 3 keys in order to participate in the tournament. In the first round of the tournament, she competed against Clarice and Elma but was eliminated sometime before the semi-finals.

character.name: Agilder (Schullin)
character.description: Schullin`s Accelgor is a Pokémon Performer that competed in the Glorio Tripokalon Master Class Tournament. In the first round of the tournament, it competed against Clarice and Elma but was eliminated sometime before the semi-finals.

character.name: Shin Lee
character.description: Shin Lee is a Pokémon Performer that competed in the Glorio Tripokalon Master Class Tournament. Her name wasn`t confirmed until XYZ19. She had obtained the required 3 keys in order to participate in the tournament. In the first round of the tournament, she competed against Serena and Miette but was eliminated after she lost to Serena in that round.

character.name: Glacia (Shin Lee)
character.description: Shin Lee`s Glaceon is a Pokémon Performer that competed in the Glorio Tripokalon Master Class Tournament. In the first round of the tournament, it competed against Serena and Miette but was eliminated after it lost to Serena in that round.

character.name: Chevargo (Schullin)
character.description: Schullin`s Escavalier participated in the Frey Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament theme performance round which featured the Performers and their Pokémon attempting to attracts the highest number of Sihorn to their side within the time limit to proceed to the free performance. It managed to help win that round but unfortunately for Schullin, she lost in the free performance round.

character.name: Yanappu (Lily)
character.description: Lily`s Pansage was briefly seen at the dance party held by Monsieur Pierre.

character.name: Leafia (Shin Lee)
character.description: Shin Lee`s Leafeon participated in the theme and free performance rounds of the Renri Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. It unfortunately lost out to Jessie who won the tournament. None of its moves were officially confirmed.

character.name: Elma
character.description: Elma is a Pokémon Performer that competed in the Glorio Tripokalon Master Class Tournament. She had obtained the required 3 keys in order to participate in the tournament. In the first round of the tournament, she competed against Clarice and Schullin but was eliminated sometime before the semi-finals.

character.name: Roserade (Elma)
character.description: Elma`s Roserade is a Pokémon Performer that competed in the Glorio Tripokalon Master Class Tournament. In the first round of the tournament, it competed against Clarice and Schullin but was eliminated sometime before the semi-finals.

character.name: Stan
character.description: Stan is a rescue worker paramedic that works in the Joule Town area. A lightning bolt caused him to lose control over his vehicle and crash. He injured his leg and was able to temporarily fix it but he was unable to go anywhere. He managed to make it to a nearby cave to get out of the storm. Ash and his friends met Stan when they also entered that cave to avoid the storm. He initially startled them but once they saw that he was injured and had introduced himself, he asked them to take the medicine to the town for the children waiting for it. Ash took the medicine and successfully delivered it for him while Serena and the other rescued Stan and took him to Nurse Joy who determined he wasn`t seriously injured.

character.name: Onvern (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Noivern is the evolved form of Ash`s Noibat. It evovled during a battle against Zapdos in which Ash`s Hawlucha was hit and was falling out of the sky. Ash`s Noibat quickly went after Ash`s Hawlucha and on its way there, it evolved and managed to rescue it. As a result of evolving, it also learned the move Boomburst which was instrumental in the battle against Zapdos and defeating Team Rocket`s mecha which was trying to capture Zapdos. Once Zapdos realized that Ash`s Noivern wasn`t actually trying to hurt it or capture it when it protected it against Team Rocket, it was thankful and discontinued its aggression towards Ash. In the first match-up in the 2nd 3-on-3 battle of Ash vs Sawyer (Scottie), Sawyer`s Doublade was paired up against Ash`s Noivern. Despite using Iron Defense multiple times to tire out Noivern, it tried to take advantage of a chance it thought it had but it backfired as Noivern used a combination of moves in the air to defeat Sawyer`s Doublade. Sawyer`s Clawitzer was sent out and its Dragon Pulse directly hit Noivern before it could finish launching its attack and knocked it out of the match.

character.name: Edo
character.description: Ed is a master locksmith that has a workshop in Jacore Town where he also trains his apprentice Locke. Officer Jenny called him in to the jew exhibit to check on one of his locks that had been picked. He confirmed that it was his lock and that it had indeed been broken. Since none of the jewels were actually stolen, Officer Jenny began to believe that this was a hate crime targeting Ed. By this time, Ed had already realized that the only person that had enough knowledge to break his locks was his apprentice Locke but he didn`t tell anyone at that point. Righty had attached itself onto Bonnie as it was trying to find Locke and Lefty. Ed said he didn`t have the time so Righty went off on its own to find them. After reuniting in the hotel hallway, Ed allowed Righty to stay with Bonnie for a day while they went looking for Locke and Lefty. Once they found them, Righty returned to Ed to bring him to the Pokémon Center which was on fire and Locke and Lefty were trapped inside. Undeterred by the fire and his safety, Ed charged to the storage room door which was locked and damaged by the fire. He and Locke worked together and reconciled their differences and managed to open the door to save all the Pokémon in Poké Balls that were inside the storage room. Ed told Locke that he had known that he was the Master Thief Keyes and he was welcomed to return to the locksmith shop as soon as he had atoned for his crimes. Little did Locke realize, but Ed had already talked to Officer Jenny and since all Locke had really done was open locks, she was only going to issue him a stern warning and he`ll be released in no time at all. Ed figured this would make him learn his lesson better if he didn`t tell him beforehand.

character.name: Kobushi
character.description: Locke is a locksmith that works at Ed`s shop in Jacore Town where he also trains under him as his apprentice. He took on the masked persona Master Thief Keyes (Mysterious Knuckle) in an attempt to show Ed that he`d become a very good locksmith. Locke targeted multiple locks created by Ed. He would pick and unlock them but wouldn`t actually steal any of the contents inside. Officer Jenny called Ed in to the jew exhibit to check on one of his locks that had been picked. He confirmed that it was his lock and that it had indeed been broken. Since none of the jewels were actually stolen, Officer Jenny began to believe that this was a hate crime targeting Ed. By this time, Ed had already realized that the only person that had enough knowledge to break his locks was his apprentice Locke but he didn`t tell anyone at that point. Righty had attached itself onto Bonnie as it was trying to find Locke and Lefty. Ed said he didn`t have the time so Righty went off on its own to find them. After reuniting in the hotel hallway, Ed allowed Righty to stay with Bonnie for a day while they went looking for Locke and Lefty. Locke had been followed by Team Rocket and they wanted him to unlock the door to the Pokémon Center`s Poké Ball Storage Room but he found back and drove them off. Team Rocket though hit some canisters which blew up and caused the storage room to catch on fire. Nurse Joy told Locke that there were a lot of Pokémon in the storage room but she lost track of the key when the room caught fire, so he quickly picked the lock and started gathering the Poké Balls. Once they found them, Righty returned to Ed to bring him to the Pokémon Center which was on fire and Locke and Lefty were trapped inside. Undeterred by the fire and his safety, Ed charged to the storage room door which was locked and damaged by the fire. He and Locke worked together and reconciled their differences and managed to open the door to save all the Pokémon in Poké Balls that were inside the storage room. Ed told Locke that he had known that he was the Master Thief Keyes and he was welcomed to return to the locksmith shop as soon as he had atoned for his crimes. Little did Locke realize, but Ed had already talked to Officer Jenny and since all Locke had really done was open locks, she was only going to issue him a stern warning and he`ll be released in no time at all. Ed figured this would make him learn his lesson better if he didn`t tell him beforehand.

character.name: Kametete (Edo)
character.description: Righty is one of the arms of Binacle. It got mad at Ed when he decided that he wasn`t going to look for Locke. Righty had attached itself onto Bonnie after the break-in at the hotel as it was trying to find Locke and Lefty. After reuniting in the hotel hallway, Ed allowed Righty to stay with Bonnie for a day while they went looking for Locke and Lefty. Once they found them, Righty returned to Ed to bring him to the Pokémon Center which was on fire and Locke and Lefty were trapped inside. It helped put out the fire by using Water Gun. It was reunited with Lefty some point after Lefty was taken with Locke to the police station for question.

character.name: Kametete (Kobushi)
character.description: Lefty is one of the arms of Binacle. It left with Locke and became part of the masked persona Master Thief Keyes (Mysterious Knuckle) in an attempt to show Ed that they`d become a very good locksmith duo. Locke targeted multiple locks created by Ed. He would pick and unlock them but wouldn`t actually steal any of the contents inside. Righty got mad at Ed when he decided that he wasn`t going to look for Locke. Righty had attached itself onto Bonnie after the break-in at the hotel as it was trying to find Locke and Lefty. After reuniting in the hotel hallway, Ed allowed Righty to stay with Bonnie for a day while they went looking for Locke and Lefty. Once they found them, Righty returned to Ed to bring him to the Pokémon Center which was on fire and Locke and Lefty were trapped inside. It helped put out the fire by using Water Gun. It was reunited with Lefty some point after Lefty was taken with Locke to the police station for question.

character.name: Vivillon (Elle)
character.description: Aria`s Vivillon was revealed during the Kalos Queen final round. It performed in the finals and it lifted Aria up in the air to make it look like she was flying. The performance was enough for Aria and her Pokémon to defend their title and retain the title of Kalos Queen by defeating Serena.

character.name: Lillia
character.description: Lillia is a girl that resides in the Kalos region that is searching for a partner. She met Clemont one day and was quite fascinated by him. She was particularly interested in his Eipam Arm and commented that it was a fine device. Her father is the president of Orange Logo, the leading robot manufacturer in the industry. Whoever she marries will become the president of that company. Bonnie initially asked Lillia to marry her brother Clemont and when Lillia didn`t brush off the remark like most girls did and actually began to consider the proposal, Bonnie got a bit concerned and started imagining all the scenarios that would occur as a result of them getting married. After an encounter with Team Rocket in which Clemont had to save his sister Bonnie with his Eipam Arm before she fell to her doom, Lillia realized that, as someone who`s looking for a partner, she needed to improve herself a lot more and that it seemed to her like she was still lacking appeal. She decided not to travel with Clemont and the other to the nearby Pokémon Center and parted ways.

character.name: Mimirol (Lillia)
character.description: Lillia`s Buneary met Clemont`s Bunnelby in a forest when it found the ball that had been kicked into the nearby bushes where Clemont`s Bunnelby and the others were playing. Clemont`s Bunnelby had gone looking for the ball but Lillia`s Buneary was holding it when they met. Lillia`s Buneary quickly became infatuated with Clemont`s Bunnelby and they spent time together while Clemont and Lillia got to know each other. While being respectful and nice to Lillia`s Buneary, it was clear Clemont`s Bunnelby didn`t share the same affection towards her. Clemont`s Chespin and Serena`s Pancham both fought to gain Lillia`s Buneary attention but she didn`t want to associate with them and was only interested in Clemont`s Bunnelby, presumably because it was a fellow rabbit. The two parted ways when Lillia decided to go her separate ways, but it was clear that Lillia`s Buneary still liked Clemont`s Bunnelby and was a bit sad it had to part.

character.name: Jimmy
character.description: Jimmy is a Guitarist and a Pokémon Trainer. He is known as the Wandering Guitarist but people also call him Jimmy the Pikachu Trainer. He travels around searching for strong Pikachu`s to battle him. He can clearly be identified by the make-up he wears that makes him look like a Pikachu as well as the loud noise from his guitar. He heard about Ash having a strong Pikachu and Jimmy was searching for him when he encountered Team Rocket. He overheard Meowth talking about a strong Pikachu. After searching for awhile, he found Pikachu and wanted to battle but Ash had caught a cold so Serena pretended to be Ash and battled him until Team Rocket showed up and tried to get both Pikachu`s. Ash came out of the tent to see what was going on and realized what Team Rocket was up to. After fending off Team Rocket, Jimmy realized that Serena had tricked him but was impressed with her abilities as a trainer. Ash and Jimmy decided to battle against each other for real this time but it wasn`t shown in the episode as they stopped to eat before the battle took place.

character.name: Pikachu (Jimmy)
character.description: Jimmy`s Pikachu is easily spotted with its mohawk hair style for which Jimmy nicknamed his Pikachu, Spike. It battled against Pikachu with Serena commanding it but that battle was cut short with Team Rocket interfering and attempting to capture both Pikachu`s. Ash had agreed to battle, but that battle was not shown in the episode.

character.name: Komoruu (Shouta)
character.description: Sawyer`s Shelgon was briefly seen battling against Ash`s Hawlucha and was defeated by its Flying Press. It is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Bagon.

character.name: Hitotsuki (Shouta)
character.description: Sawyer`s Honedge was revealed after Sawyer`s Shelgon was defeated in the 3-on-3 battle against Ash. Sawyer exclaimed that it wouldn`t lose but it was matched up against Pikachu and lost in a 1-hit KO by Pikachu`s Thunderbolt. Sawyer`s Doublade is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Honedge. It evolved sometime after Ash`s battle with Sawyer in XYZ 13 and before their battle in XYZ 26.

character.name: Jukain (Shouta)
character.description: At the beginning of the 3rd match-up in the 3-on-3 battle against Ash, it was revealed that Sawyer`s Grovyle had evolved into Sawyer`s Sceptile. It was revealed in the quarter-final match of the Kalos League against Tierno that Sawyer`s Sceptile could mega evolve. It`s mega evolved forms Ability is Lightning Rod which nullifies Electric moves like Thunder.

character.name: Metang (Alan)
character.description: Alain`s Metang was the second Pokémon revealed to viewers. It was sent out to battle against Ash`s Noivern and was triumphant in a hard fought match.

character.name: Nidangill (Shouta)
character.description: Sawyer`s Doublade is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Honedge. It evolved sometime after Ash`s battle with Sawyer in XYZ 13 and before their battle in XYZ 26. In the first match-up in the 2nd 3-on-3 battle of Ash vs Sawyer, Sawyer`s Doublade was paired up against Ash`s Noivern. Despite using Iron Defense multiple times to tire out Noivern, it tried to take advantage of a chance it thought it had but it backfired as Noivern used a combination of moves in the air to defeat Sawyer`s Doublade. Sawyer`s Aegislash is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Doublade. It evolved sometime before the the start of the Kalos League.

character.name: Bloster (Shouta)
character.description: Sawyer`s Clawitzer was the second Pokémon sent out to battle in the first 2nd 3-on-3 battle of Ash vs Sawyer. It replaced Sawyer`s Doublade who was defeated by Ash`s Noivern. It proved to be a very effective Pokémon in the match as it quickly finished off Ash`s Noivern and then faced off against Ash`s Hawlucha. Sawyer had already devised a tactic to defeat Hawlucha and he lured it high into the air and used the super effective Ice Beam against it to 1-hit KO it. Ash`s Greninja then entered the match and with its first attack, it knocked out Sawyer`s Clawitzer.

character.name: Urup
character.description: Wulfric is the Gym Leader of the Snowbelle Gym located in Snowbelle City in Kalos. He specializes in using Ice-type Pokémon and trainers that defeat him receive the Iceberg Badge. He finds cold temperatures just right for his body temperature. Sawyer (Scottie) defeated Wulfric in a heated battle a few days before Ash showed up for his gym battle. Ash challenged Wulfric for his final badge and Wulfric noted that this gym battle would determine if he`d get his 8th and final badge. He told Ash that Ice is both extremely hard and terribly fragile at the same time and that the choice of Pokémon he decided to use would affect his battle strength.

character.name: Yukinooh (Urup)
character.description: Wulfric`s Abomasnow was the first Pokémon Ash faced in his first battle against Wulfric. It is able to mega evolve into Mega Abomasnow. It`s Ability is Snow Warning which creates an intense Hailstorm on the battlefield.

character.name: Crebase (Urup)
character.description: Wulfric`s Avalugg was the second Pokémon that Wulfric used in the first gym battle against Ash after Ash`s Hawlucha defeated Wulfric`s Abomasnow. It`s Ability is Ice Body and when it`s hailing, it recovers a bit of stamina.

character.name: Kachikohru (Urup)
character.description: Wulfric`s Bergmite was the first Pokémon sent out to battle in rematch of Ash versus Wulfric. It was matched up against Pikachu. After Pikachu was able to run off the freezing effects of Icy Wind, the match significantly took a turn into Pikachu`s favor and it was quickly able to land a few good hits and finished of Wulfric`s Bergmite with an Iron Tail.

character.name: Lizardon (Trova)
character.description: Trevor`s Charizard is the evolved form of Trevor`s Charmeleon. It evolved sometime before the first match of the Kalos league. Trevor`s trump card was that his Charizard can mega evolve and he had been working hard before the Kalos league to prepare. Trevor`s Charizard`s ability is Drought which greatly increases the power of Fire type moves. It was defeated in the first round of the Kalos league by Alain`s Charizard when it fired a Flamethrower up in the sky.

character.name: Takeru
character.description: Takeru is a Pokémon trainer that was attempting to enter the Kalos League but did not get enough badges in time to enter. He attended the opening ceremonies for the Kalos League where he saw Ash being interviewed and that he was going to be the winner of the league. Mad and annoyed that he didn`t manage to enter the league, he tried to take that frustration out on Ash by challenging him to battle but Serena pulled him away but not before he accepted the challenge to battle at another time. When Ash was heading for his first round battle, Takeru confronted him again and this time the battle took place. Ash handily defeated him with Pikachu and Takeru broke down crying and told Ash to honor the dreams of those like him that wanted to compete but couldn`t.

character.name: Trimmien (Takeru)
character.description: Takeru`s Furfrou battled against Pikachu in a match right before Ash`s first round in the Kalos League. Takeru`s Furfrou is the Kabuki Trim form. It was handily defeated by Pikachu and Ash as they were in a hurry to make their their match.

character.name: Tomo
character.description: Tomo is a Pokémon Trainer that qualified for the Kalos League and was matched up against Ash in the first round. He almost won the match by default as Ash almost didn`t arrive on time before the referee called the match. Most of the battle was not showcased but Ash defeated Tomo to eliminate him from the competition. As the first round was a 3-on-3 battle, he has at least 2 other Pokémon that were in the match but were not shown at all.

character.name: Tyltalis (Tomo)
character.description: Tomo`s Altaria battled against Ash`s Greninja in the first round of the Kalos League where it was easily defeated without Ash`s Greninja straining too much. Ash commented after its defeat that he wanted Greninja to beat all of Tomo`s Pokémon in one go but that outcome was never confirmed.

character.name: Gillgard (Shouta)
character.description: Sawyer`s Aegislash is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Doublade. It evolved sometime before the the start of the Kalos League. It battled against Tierno`s Ludicolo and defeated it but it was then defeated by Tierno`s Raichu.

character.name: Kekking (Shouta)
character.description: Sawyer`s Slaking was first seen in a flashback scene in the Kalos League where is was defeating a Medicham.

character.name: Bohmander (Shouta)
character.description: Sawyer`s Salamence is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Shelgon. It evolved sometime before the start of the Kalos League and Ash`s battle against Sawyer in XYZ 13. It was revealed in the Kalos League semi-finals as Sawyer`s fourth Pokémon and it first faced off against Ash`s Noivern. The semi-final battle was quick but well balanced. The two ended up knocking each other out in a draw.

character.name: Bangiras (Alan)
character.description: Alain`s Tyranitar was revealed in the final round of the Kalos League. It was the first match up of the battle and it faced Pikachu. The match began with the creation of a Sandstorm caused by Tyranitar`s Ability, Sand Stream. Alain though the Standstorm would be an effective way to restrict Pikachu`s field of vision as well as its movements. Pikachu managed to wipe out the Sandstorm though by kicking up a lot of water from the stream in the battlefield. In addition, Tyranitar got drenched and the Thunderbolt used right after did significant damage. The match was concluded when Pikachu defended Crunch with its Iron Tail and then quickly followed up with an Electro Ball to knock out Tyranitar.

character.name: Manyula (Alan)
character.description: Alain`s Weavile was revealed in the Kalos League finals in the second match-up against Ash where it initially battled against Ash`s Noivern. It defeated Noivern in a highly contested battle but once it finally it with Ice Beam and caused ice to build up on its wings, it fell into the stream and Weavile finished it off with a Night Slash. The second opponent it faced in the finals was Ash`s Hawlucha who was out for revenge after Ash`s Noivern was knocked out plus it had a move type advantage as Fighting type moves are super effective against Weavile. Weavile tried to turn the match around by freezing the stream on the battlefield but it backfired as Hawlucha used it to its advantage and then went on the offensive and finished off Weavile with a Flying Press.

character.name: Kirikizan (Alan)
character.description: Alain`s Bisharp was revealed in the Kalos League finals and was sent out to replace Alain`s Weavile after it was defeated by Ash`s Hawlucha. The battle with Hawlucha didn`t last too long as it was damaged from its previous battle. After it missed with High Jump Kick, Bisharp finished it off with a Guillotine. Ash`s Goodra was its next opponent and the match started off with it using Rain Dance. When Bide wasn`t able to knock it out, it fought back with Guillotine and knocked out Goodra. After defeating Ash`s Goodra, Ash`s Greninja was sent out to face Bisharp. Having already taken a lot of damage from its previous battles, it wasn`t much of a battle as Ash`s Greninja finished it off with its first attack.

character.name: Kenhallow (Alan)
character.description: Alain`s Unfezant was revealed in the final round of the Kalos League where it was matched up against Ash`s Talonflame. The battle took place almost entirely in the sky and they were both evenly matched up. The match didn`t actually take too long and they only exchanged a few attacks until they collided together in a combination of Brave Bird and Sky Attack to knock each other out.

character.name: Metagross (Alan)
character.description: Alain`s Metagross was revealed in the Kalos League finals after the battlefield change. It is possibly the evolved form of Alain`s Metang but it was not confirmed. Pikachu, who had been resting from its battle with Alain`s Tyranitar, was matched up against Metagross. Metagross dominated a lot of the match until Pikachu was able to jump on its back and hit it with a Thunderbolt. Metagross managed to shake it off but Pikachu fought back hard and finished off Metagross with its Iron Tail.

character.name: Gyarados (Fleur-de-lis)
character.description: Lysandre`s Gyarados is alternate-colored and has a Gyaradosite so it can Mega Evolve. It was sent out to battle against Ash and Alain on top of the Prism Tower. It is an extremely powerful Pokémon and it was able to handily take out most of Ash`s Pokémon until it was finally weaken when it was mass attacked in turn by a lot of their Pokémon.

character.name: Crobat (Xerosicy)
character.description: Xerosic`s Crobat was sent out to battle Clemont at the Prism Tower but his Pokémon were not able to handle the onslaught of Clemont`s Pokémon and it was quickly knocked out.

character.name: Calamanero (Xerosicy)
character.description: Xerosic`s Malamar was sent out to battle Clemont at the Prism Tower but his Pokémon were not able to handle the onslaught of Clemont`s Pokémon and it was quickly knocked out.

character.name: Alba
character.description: Alba is a beginning Pokémon Trainer in the Kalos region. He visited the Miare Gym after the events of Flare Gang and instantly recognized Ash from the Kalos League. He had watched it and though it was incredibly cool and got so fired up that he also wanted to enter the league no matter what. He had visited the gym a few days earlier and lost to the Clembot and he wanted a rematch because he had been beaten to a pulp by it and he wanted to get the badge. Unfortunately, the Clembot`s memory had been erased and its battle style was basically back to a beginner as well. Despite this, Clemont agreed to let come back the next day to battle the Clembot when repairs to the gym were completed and he could do some more tweaking to Clembot. Motivated and pumped up to get the badge, fought with all he could and remembered what Clembot had taught him; that Pokémon have endless potential and that drawing out their strengths is a Trainer`s duty. Alba and his Pokémon believed in those words and worked hard and it paid off as they defeated the Clembot to get the Voltage Badge.

character.name: Vivillon (Alba)
character.description: Alba`s Vivillon was the first Pokémon sent out to battle the Clembot in the rematch battle. It was initially matched up against Clemont`s Magnemite. It was able to quickly defeat it by rendered it completely immobile with Sleep Powder and then finish it off with an Energy Ball. Being Clembot`s first battle since its memory wipe, Alba`s Vivillon battle against Clemont`s Magnemite was pretty easy. Clemont reminded Clembot not to get agitated and to watch the opponent closely. Clembot vowed not to loose this time. It sent out Clemont`s Magneton and with a quick combination of Rain Dance and Thunder, it one hit KO`d Alba`s Vivillon.

character.name: Kaenjishi (Alba)
character.description: Alba`s Pyroar was the second Pokémon that Alba used in his rematch battle against the Clembot. It was only briefly shown but it was defeated by Clemont`s Magneton.

character.name: Karakara (Alba)
character.description: Alba`s Cubone was the final Pokémon that Alba used in his rematch battle against the Clembot. It quickly finished off Clemont`s Magneton before facing Clemont`s Heliolisk. Its Bonemerang proved to be a very powerful move as it knocked out Elezard when they pulled on the training advice of the Clembot which taught them; that Pokémon have endless potential and that drawing out their strengths is a Trainer`s duty. Alba and his Pokémon believed in those words and worked hard and it paid off as they defeated the Clembot to get the Voltage Badge.
